title: Virtual Assistant – Execution Owner
description:
Hi,



BabyGains is a premium fitness-inspired baby brand. After a strong 2025, we are scaling aggressively in 2026. We are not looking for a task follower. We are looking for someone who takes ownership over execution and structure.

This is not a role for someone who waits for instructions. This is for someone who thinks, organizes, and executes independently.



Role & Responsibility

You take operational ownership.  Costumer care is owned by you That means orders are sent without reminders. DMs are answered daily and engagement on comments and feed stays high.
s are checked and structured..  Deadlines are met. Administrative tasks are handled after clear instruction.



I should not be structuring your time, workflows. You build the structure. You take ownership.

You turn loose ideas into working systems inside Notion. You improve processes, document SOPs, and use AI tools like ChatGPT to work faster and smarter. You make sure everything behind the scenes runs tight. You are the main contact of our fullment center for small issues or double checks.





What We Expect

Proactivity.

Management-level thinking.

Being ahead instead of reacting.

Finding solutions instead of explaining problems.

Chasing progress instead of being chased.



Required Skills & Experience

Proven experience with Shopify.

Comfortable working inside Notion.

Experience with Gmail and Google Drive.

Daily use of Instagram and TikTok.

Ability to quickly learn fulfilment systems (WMS) or other digital tools.

Ability to leverage AI tools effectively in your workflow.

Basic administrative skills such as handling invoices and maintaining clear overviews.



A strong plus if you understand margins, and basic performance marketing logic.

This role is not for someone who needs daily direction.

Not for someone who only executes what is asked.

Not for someone who explains why things did not get done.



This is for an independent operator who builds systems, creates clarity, and takes responsibility.

We start with 15–20 hours per week, with room to scale quickly based on performance.



You get autonomy, direct collaboration with the founder, a brand with a clear vision, and real responsibility inside a growing international e-commerce business.

Interested?

 

Or send a WhatsApp to
Tell us what systems you have built before, your experience with Shopify and Notion, and how you use AI in your daily workflow.

title: GHL Funnel & Website Builder with Strong Workflow & Graphic Design Experience
description:
Part-Time GoHighLevel (GHL) Builder + Automation + Graphic Design

20 hours per week (4 hours/day, 5 days)?

Ongoing role for the right person - after an initial trial



IMPORTANT – PLEASE READ FULL DESCRIPTION

This is a part-time, ongoing position for someone confident in GoHighLevel, comfortable with automation logic, and capable of building professional pages and a great user experience.



You must know your way around the GHL platform and work independently.

You must also have experience in Graphic Design (as we do not build from templates, we will build from our own designs - sometimes these will be provided, sometimes you may be asked to support in brand design depending on your skills)



What You’ll Be Doing

• Building long-form sales pages and websites in GoHighLevel (or occasionally Wordpress)?• 

Creating structured layouts using blank sections (not stacking templates)?•

 Setting up workflows & automations?•

 Connecting tools via Zapier or Make (webhooks etc.)?• 

Working inside WordPress (plugins, builds) with a solid understanding of SEO

?Making small CSS adjustments when needed?

Ensuring strong mobile optimisation?

Maintaining clean visual hierarchy and user experience



Bonus (not essential):?• Experience in building quizzes using 'ScoreApp'



Design Expectations

You should:

• Be confident in Canva

?• Be comfortable using Photoshop

?• Understand spacing, alignment, and layout flow (A keen design eye)

?• Care about clean, professional aesthetics (we are particular about this)



Branding, copy and direction will be provided.?You’ll focus on execution, polish and flow.



Ideal Fit

• Enjoys building workflows and solving automation logic

?• Comfortable with “technical” elements (CSS, integrations, webhooks)

title: Amazon Graphic Design Specialist
description:
Graphic Design Specialist – Amazon Marketing Agency (Remote)



Full-Time | Remote | Competitive Salary + PTO



About Us:



The Amazon Whisperer is a fast-growing, full-service Amazon marketing agency that delivers profitable sales growth for consumer brands. We specialize in Amazon SEO, PPC, listing optimization, catalog management, and compelling, conversion-focused creative design is at the heart of what we do. We’re looking for a Graphic Design Specialist to help bring our clients’ listings to life through world-class images and storefronts that drive traffic and convert sales.



The Role:



The Graphic Design Specialist is responsible for producing Amazon-optimized creative assets, including main images, listing graphics, A+ content, premium A+ content, brand stories, and storefronts. You’ll work closely with our Design Lead to adapt proven templates to different products, ensuring copy, callouts, and visuals are tailored to the right customer profile. You’ll also respond to edit requests from the Project Manager and Brand Managers, ensuring existing creative assets are always accurate and optimized.



This is a fast-paced, high-volume design role where you’ll be producing 140–160 images per month, supporting a wide range of Amazon brands and product categories. Tasks will be assigned in Asana, and you’ll be expected to deliver them on time and with minimal revisions needed.



Responsibilities:



- Work with the Design Lead and Project Manager to complete creative deliverables in Asana

- Adapt image templates to new products while maintaining brand tone and strategy

- Optimize main images to improve click-through rate and visibility

- Design infographics and lifestyle images that target specific customer profiles

- Ensure listing images require minimal edits after upload

- Check for accurate language, spelling, and benefit callouts

- Design and upload A+ Content, Brand Stories, and Storefronts

- Support Premium A+ builds when needed

- Respond to feedback and revision requests from Brand and Project Managers

- Maintain consistency with brand guidelines and internal creative standards



Requirements:



- Minimum 1 year experience working with Amazon listing design

- Minimum 3 years of experience using Photoshop or similar design software

- Highly creative mindset with a strong eye for layout and consumer psychology

- Fast, reliable computer with dual monitors, 16GB+ RAM, and ample storage

- Fast internet connection to handle large file uploads/downloads

- Extremely organized and reliable, able to manage multiple active projects

- Strong English communication skills, written and verbal

- Ability to type 55+ words per minute

- Comfortable using Google Drive, Asana, and other collaboration tools

- Familiar with AI tools such as ChatGPT, MidJourney, Sora, Adobe Firefly, Gamma, etc.



Company Culture:



At The Amazon Whisperer, we highly value transparency, communication, and trust. This is not just another job, it’s a place where your ideas are valued, hard work is rewarded, and growth opportunities are everywhere. We’re building a team that operates like a unit: supportive, proactive, and relentlessly focused on client success. If you’re looking for a long-term remote role where you can grow your creative career, you’re in the right place.



What You’ll Get:



- Competitive pay

- 13 days PTO (including public holidays)

- 100% remote work

- Room to grow into roles like Senior Designer, Design Lead, and beyond

- A collaborative and growth-minded team environment



Apply today and be part of a company that’s scaling fast and doing things differently in the Amazon space. We’re not looking for average. We’re looking for exceptional.



Submit your application here:

title: Sales Development Representative (SDR) – High-Volume Cold Calling (B2G)
description:
Remote / Work From Home | Company based in California



About Us

Bi-Rite Global is a certified small business and a trusted retailer that supplies a wide range of products to government agencies — including federal, state, and education sectors. Based in California, we are rapidly expanding and focused on delivering quality products, competitive pricing, and reliable service to our government partners.



Role Summary

We are looking for a Sales Development Representative (SDR) – High-Volume Cold Calling (B2G) that is responsible for initiating outbound calls to federal, state, and local government agencies to identify contracting opportunities, introduce company services, and qualify decision-makers involved in procurement. The role supports the business development pipeline by generating leads, setting capability briefings, and gathering intelligence on upcoming bids and purchasing needs.



Key Responsibilities

• Conduct high-volume outbound calls to government offices and departments

• Identify contracting officers, procurement specialists, and program managers

• Introduce company capabilities and differentiate services

• Qualify opportunities based on agency needs, budgets, and timelines

• Schedule capability briefings or discovery meetings for sales/business development teams

• Gather information on upcoming solicitations, RFPs, and purchasing cycles

• Maintain accurate CRM records and call notes

• Follow up via
 and phone to nurture relationships

• Track targets such as contacts reached, meetings set, and opportunities generated



Qualifications 

• Professional phone presence and clear communication skills

• Persistent and comfortable with high-volume outbound calling and rejection

• Strong research skills to identify government decision-makers

• Organized with accurate CRM documentation and time management

• Understanding of B2G (Business to Government) sales or ability to learn quickly

• Experience in lead generation, appointment setting, telemarketing, or inside sales

• Exposure to government procurement or public-sector contracting preferred

• Familiarity with RFP/RFQ processes, vendor registrations, and contract vehicles is an advantage

• Able to clearly present company capabilities and services



Work Environment

• 100% Remote (must have reliable work-from-home setup)

• Structured schedule aligned with business hours of government agencies

• Use of approved scripts and compliance-focused communication

• Calls primarily to public offices, vendors, or registered partners

• Performance tracked by call quality, accuracy, and documentation — not aggressive contracting

• Collaboration with compliance, procurement, and contracts teams

• Strict adherence to data privacy, confidentiality, and record-keeping standards

• Professional and formal communication style required

• Write "I want this job" on the
 subject line.



Technical Requirements

• Stable internet (minimum 50 Mbps download/upload on fiber connection)

• Backup internet (LTE mobile data or pocket Wi-Fi)

• Laptop or desktop with Intel i5 equivalent or higher, 8GB RAM

• Quality headset with noise-canceling microphone

• Functional webcam



What’s Next

1. Interested candidates should submit a face-to-camera, 2-minute introduction Loom video explaining why you’re the ideal fit for this role.

2. Attach your Loom URL, resume, and any relevant experience samples.

title: Project-Based CMS Migration Specialist
description:
We need a meticulous Content Management expert to lead a critical website migration project. This short-term, high-impact contract focuses on preserving SEO value during a complete design overhaul.

The Project

We’re migrating our company website to a new design. This is not a simple copy-paste task. We need a CMS Specialist who understands the importance of structure, formatting, and SEO.

Your goal: Ensure a seamless transition with zero loss in organic traffic.

You will handle content migration, rebuild pages in the new theme, and ensure all SEO elements are perfectly preserved.





Your Role

1. Content Migration

Transfer all blog posts, landing pages, and service pages to the new design.

Reformat content to match the new visual guidelines, ensuring headers, images, and buttons are professional and functional.

Fix formatting issues immediately.

2. SEO Preservation

Protect rankings by carrying over all meta titles, descriptions, and URL structures.

Implement 301 redirects to prevent 404 errors.

Check and fix internal linking structures.

Optimize images (alt tags, file sizes) for the new site.

3. Quality Assurance

Test desktop and mobile versions rigorously.

Verify forms, CTAs, and interactive elements work perfectly.

Report bugs or structural issues to the development team.





What We’re Looking For

This project requires expertise, not beginners. You’ll need:

Proven Migration Experience: Share examples of successful website migrations you’ve managed.

CMS Expertise: Proficiency in WordPress.

SEO Knowledge: Strong understanding of URL slugs, canonical tags, and 301 redirects.

Attention to Detail: Spot formatting issues, broken links, and typos with ease.

HTML/CSS Basics: Ability to tweak code for minor formatting fixes.

title: Admin & Marketing Assistant
description:
PLEASE NOTE:

1. This job is open: we won't make a decision until next week

2. We are committed to going through all applicants. Even if there are many, you should apply. We are looking for the right person



Hello ????

I run several small businesses and products and also consult for a few companies on product development and strategy. I previously founded, grew, and sold a software development agency: so there's a lot going on at any given time. I need someone to help me bring order to the chaos and execute on marketing tasks I know exactly how to do but don't have the time for.





PLEASE

Read this job description carefully. You are much more likely to get this job if:

1. You don't copy-paste some AI response to our questions

2. You read carefully and provide everything we request





## What is the job about?

This is a hybrid Admin Assistant + Marketing Executor role. You'll support me across multiple businesses and projects with two types of work:



Admin & operations — the unglamorous but essential stuff: bookkeeping tasks, organizing documents, managing inboxes, preparing presentations, matching invoices to transactions, and keeping things from falling through the cracks.



Marketing execution — following clear directions (and sometimes figuring things out yourself) to get marketing work done: scheduling social media posts, sourcing leads, researching influencers, preparing demos, creating AI-generated promo videos, reaching out to partners, and more.



You do NOT need to be a marketing expert. You need to be sharp, resourceful, and able to follow instructions well... while also having enough taste and initiative to move things forward without me micromanaging every step.



What will you be doing?

In no particular order:

- Bookkeeping support — uploading invoices, matching bank transactions, reconciling spreadsheets

- Lead research — using tools I'll provide to find and compile prospect lists based on criteria (company size, industry, location, etc.)

- Influencer & partnership outreach — researching potential partners, reaching out according to templates we define together, managing relationships

- Demo preparation — setting up product demos for leads/customers following given instructions

- Content & social media — creating posting schedules, defining what gets posted when, using AI tools to generate promotional videos

-
/support inbox management — responding to questions, investigating user issues with internal tools, drafting responses for approval

- GTM support — reaching out to targets for consulting initiatives, light negotiation, keeping me in the loop

- Partner program management — keeping a webpage updated, onboarding new partners

- A variety of other admin + marketing tasks — these will evolve as we go



What does the engagement look like?

This is not a traditional role with a manual you follow every day. The tasks change daily. Some days are boring and repetitive. Other days are creative and strategic. You need to be comfortable with both.

I'm juggling a lot and won't always have time for long briefings. You'll often get short instructions (or video walkthroughs) and need to run with them. Initiative matters enormously here.



## How many hours? How does it progress?

Starting at 100–120 hours/month (~25-30h/week). There is clear growth potential to full-time (160h/month) as we prove the fit and workload increases.



## What are the requirements?

Stable internet connection

Ability to do video calls

Fluent in English (written and spoken)

Availability must overlap at least 4–5 hours with Lisbon/Portugal time

Highly organized and detail-oriented

Comfortable switching between very different tasks throughout the day

Resourceful — you Google things (or ChatGPT-them), you figure things out, you don't wait to be unblocked

Basic comfort with spreadsheets,
, and common online tools

Marketing experience is a plus but not required

Bookkeeping/admin experience is a plus but not required



## Why should you care?

This is an immense opportunity to learn and grow. You'll be exposed to multiple businesses, tools, marketing strategies, and AI products. For the right person — someone curious, proactive, and hungry to learn — this can be a career accelerator.



## How to apply?

Send your cover letter and introduction.

You MUST answer our screening questions or you will be immediately disqualified.

You MUST submit a introduction video or you will be immediately disqualified. Why? We need to see that you are proficient in English without back and forth.

As a Collections & Customer Operations Agent, you’ll be a supportive partner for our customers — helping them manage repayments, resolve arrears, and navigate their accounts with confidence. You’ll deliver clear, empathetic support via chat,
, and phone, ensuring every interaction leads to timely and positive resolutions.

You’re Perfect for This Role If You

-Strong attention to detail and ability to manage a large number of accounts efficiently



Compensation



-$75 per week for managing 30 accounts

-$150 per week for managing 60 accounts

-? $600 guaranteed monthly income when handling 60 accounts

-???? Career Growth Opportunities



High-performing account managers will have the opportunity to advance into supervisory roles, overseeing teams, managing workflows, and earning increased compensation based on performance and responsibility.



Application Process



-Interested applicants should send a direct message including:

-Phone model and confirmation that the device is jailbroken

-Current availability

-Only serious applicants will be considered. This position is intended for individuals seeking long-term professional cooperation with growth potential.

title: Ebay VA Lister Men's Clothing
description:
Daniel’s Market Place is a fast-growing U.S. based online clothing resale company focused on high-volume menswear sales on eBay. We’re looking for a detail-oriented Virtual Assistant who can consistently create 10–15 high-quality eBay listings per hour  (with room to grow beyond that as you get faster and more familiar with our processes) — this is a key performance expectation. You’ll be responsible for drafting optimized eBay titles and descriptions, researching competitive pricing, organizing inventory spreadsheets, tagging SKUs, uploading photos, and maintaining listing accuracy. The ideal candidate is organized, tech-savvy, efficient with repetitive tasks, and able to follow structured processes while maintaining accuracy and speed. Experience with eBay listing workflows, product research, and clothing resale is strongly preferred. This is a long-term remote position with consistent weekly work and opportunity to grow with the business.



Required Skills



Strong English communication



Attention to detail (VERY important)



Basic spreadsheet knowledge (Google Sheets/Excel)



Ability to follow SOPs and hit productivity goals (10–15 listings/hr)



Reliable internet and computer



Bonus Skills (big advantage)



eBay listing experience



Fashion or clothing knowledge (brands, sizing, materials)



Photo organization / file naming



Researching sold comps
salary: 5 USD Per Hour $1000 per Month USD

title: Experienced Sales Representative / Salesperson B2B/B2C experience
description:
Good day! We are looking for (3) Sales Closer for our B2B Uniform Work kits. Experience with Leads Generation and Sales Closing is a must.



Company Overview: RomAri Global LLC is a U.S.-based logistics and e-commerce support company. We specialize in logistics, shipping, and Amazon FBA prep solutions for international sellers. In addition, we manage and sell our own private-label brand on Amazon. We are seeking a highly driven Sales Professional with a proven track record of generating leads, building client relationships, and consistently closing sales. This is not an entry-level role — we are only looking for experienced, results-oriented sales experts.



Position type:

•Remote work / Work frrom home

•Independent contractor role



Key responsibilities:

•Close B2B sales for uniform kits and safety apparel (construction, logistics, manufacturing, and service companies)

•Communicate with prospects via phone,
, and video calls

•Understand client needs and recommend suitable uniform and safety gear packages

•Build long-term relationships with business clients

•Maintain accurate records of sales activities and deals

•Generate leads and classify as hot or cold leads.



Requirements:

•Experience selling to the US market (B2B preferred)

•Strong English communication and negotiation skills

•Proven ability to close deals independently

•Reliable internet and professional work setup



Why join us?

•High-demand B2B product (essential workwear & safety gear)

•Low competition, easy to close

•High Commission rate (Bulk orders)



How to apply?

• Send us the following:

- Resume / CV

- Whatsapp number



IMPORTANT: write "B2B Closer" in the title of your application.

title: Patient Care Coordinator
description:
We are looking for a highly motivated and experienced Remote Patient Services Representative based in the Philippines. The ideal candidate will manage inbound and outbound calls, assist patients with scheduling appointments, address inquiries, and perform other related tasks to ensure a seamless patient experience.



Key Responsibilities:

• Answer incoming calls promptly and professionally.

• Schedule, reschedule, and confirm patient appointments using our electronic health record (EHR) system.

• Provide accurate information regarding services, insurance, and payment options.

• Address patient inquiries and concerns with empathy and efficiency.

• Maintain and update patient records with a high degree of accuracy.

• Collaborate with the optometry team to ensure optimal patient care.



Performance Metrics:

To ensure excellence in patient service, the following performance metrics will be used to evaluate success in this role:

• Average Handle Time (AHT): The average duration of a patient interaction, including talk time, hold time, and after-call work. Efficiently managing AHT ensures timely assistance to patients while maintaining service quality. ?

• Quality Score: Assessment of call quality based on adherence to protocols, accuracy of information provided, and overall patient interaction effectiveness. High-quality scores reflect a commitment to excellence in patient care.

• Patient Satisfaction Score: A measure of patient contentment with the service provided, often gathered through post-interaction surveys. High scores indicate successful patient engagement and issue resolution.

• Service Level: The percentage of calls answered within a specified timeframe, reflecting the ability to meet patient demand promptly. Maintaining a high service level ensures patient satisfaction and loyalty. ?

• Appointment Scheduling Rate: The efficiency and accuracy in scheduling patient appointments, ensuring optimal utilization of clinic time and resources.



Qualifications:

• Proven experience in a customer service role, preferably in a medical or optometry setting.

• Exceptional verbal and written English communication skills.

• Familiarity with EHR systems and medical scheduling software is a plus.

• Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.

• Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.

• Stable internet connection and a quiet workspace conducive to professional phone conversations.



Work Schedule:

• Full-time position.

• Must be available to work U.S. business hours, including potential evening shifts to accommodate different time zones.



To Qualify, please complete the Assessment below:



1. Application form: wkf.ms/45nfpCJ

2. Complete this assessment: 
/link/index/JB-BYUGHNDRC?u=

title: Medical Virtual Scribe
description:
We are seeking a dedicated and detail-oriented Medical Virtual Scribe to work in hospitals or clinics, helping to improve documentation and streamline the process of treating patients in an Optometry Office. The primary role of the Medical Virtual Scribe is to manage electronic health records and document patient visits accurately (Live Scribing). This role includes overseeing information technology tasks in a medical office and performing clerical functions related to communication and recordkeeping.



Responsibilities:



Assist Doctors and manage medical documentation by summarizing patient interactions.

Perform basic research tasks by communicating with other healthcare providers and updating contact information.

Ensure confidentiality and privacy of patient information.

Exhibit a level of professionalism and cleanliness when working with medical staff.

Handle high-pressure situations effectively and maintain organization in a fast-paced environment.



Qualifications:



Demonstrated ability to expertly document patient care

Proficiency in transcribing patient appointments accurately.

Advanced computer skills with familiarity in electronic health records systems.

Strong commitment to maintaining patient confidentiality and privacy.

Excellent organizational, multitasking, and time management skills.

Ability to handle high-pressure situations effectively.

Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.

Ability to work efficiently in a fast-paced environment.

title: Multimedia Marketing Specialist (Remote)
description:
???? Multimedia Marketing Specialist (Remote)



Own the Creative Storytelling and Digital Growth of Property Rush



Be the force behind our video content, podcast production, presentation assets, social platform ownership and digital advertising execution.



Are you a high-level creative who thrives on pacing, platform algorithms, and clean execution? Do you love taking raw footage and turning it into engaging content that not only looks great — but also performs according to the latest digital ad standards?



Property Rush is a U.S.-based real estate investment and property management company. We’re hiring a Multimedia Marketing Specialist (Remote) to help us dominate our digital presence and ensure our marketing operations stay organized, consistent, and data-driven.



This is a high-ownership role for a specialist who understands the “why” behind the “what” in digital marketing — and takes pride in polished output.

________________________________________



???? Why You’ll Love This Role

• Creative + Strategic Ownership: We film — you create, package, distribute, and optimize.

• Build With Us: We have structured tools in place, and we’re actively tightening our processes — you’ll play a key role in making them better.

• Stability: Long-term remote role with a supportive, systems-driven team.

• High Impact: Your edits and ad management directly drive attention, leads, and performance.

• Growth: Gain hands-on experience with U.S. real estate and grow in responsibility as the portfolio scales.

________________________________________



???? What You’ll Do

20% – BIG ROCKS (Core Creative + Ads Ownership)

? Omni-Channel Content Creation (Short-Form First)

• Edit raw footage into high-performing Reels, TikToks, Shorts, and platform-native feed content

• Tailor content for FB, IG, TikTok, X, and other interactive platforms (format, pacing, captions, trends)

• Create multiple versions of the same content (different openings and lengths) optimized for each platform (different hooks, cut-downs, 9:16 / 1:1 / 16:9)

? Podcast & Long-Form Production (Packaging Thought Leadership)

• Support post-production for planned podcasts (clean edits, pacing, polishing)

• Identify “golden nugget” 
nts and turn them into short-form clips

• Create content packs around each episode (clips + quote/takeaway posts + thumbnails)

? Presentation & Slide Design

• Create professional slide decks and visual presentations for podcasts, webinars, and internal use

• Build simple on-brand templates so recurring decks look consistent and high-end

• Turn outlines into clean, structured slides (frameworks, takeaways, simple visuals)

? Ad Strategy & Execution (Google Ads + Social)

• Apply working knowledge of Google Ads and platform algorithms to support campaigns

• Improve ad performance through creative testing (new hooks, new angles, new cuts)

• Help package ad-ready creatives (hooks, headlines, thumbnails, captions, variations)

? Brand Standards (S.I.G.)

• Ensure all content reflects Property Rush values: stewardship, integrity, and growth (S.I.G.)

• Maintain consistent visual quality and brand voice across channels

________________________________________



80% – DAILY & WEEKLY EXECUTION

• Pipeline Management: Receive raw footage and turn around polished edits on schedule (drafts ? revisions ? finals)

• Platform Management: Post/schedule content across FB/IG/TikTok/X and monitor performance

• Engagement Support: Monitor comments/messages and respond or escalate using guidelines

• Visual Asset Creation: Build slide decks/presentation materials based on BJ’s outlines or topics

• Ad + Algorithm Monitoring: Track performance signals and suggest adjustments to hooks, pacing, angle, and format

• Digital Organization: Keep all creative files, photos, b-roll, ad creatives, and podcast assets organized and audit-ready

• Proactive Reporting: Provide weekly updates on content output, performance trends, and ad creative health

________________________________________



? You’re a Fit If You…

• Have 3+ years experience in social media management and high-end video editing

• Are a “Specialist” or “Craftsman” who takes pride in precision, follow-through, and accuracy

• Are proficient in video tools (CapCut, Premiere Pro, Final Cut, DaVinci, etc.)

• Are comfortable creating slide decks using Canva / Google Slides / PowerPoint / Keynote

• Have working knowledge of Google Ads concepts and platform trends (TikTok/Reels/X)

• Understand performance basics: hook, retention, watch time, CTR, creative fatigue, iteration

• Are highly organized, detail-oriented, and reliable 

• can manage multiple platforms, take ownership and follow through without micromanagement

• Communicate clearly and professionally in English

• Can share a portfolio of short-form edits and/or pages you’ve managed (required)



? Bonus Points: Experience with Meta Ads Manager, graphic design (Canva), YouTube Shorts strategy, light copywriting, content scheduling tools, and familiarity with podcast workflows or real estate marketing

________________________________________



???? Perks & Highlights

• Remote role with consistent work and steady content volume

• Clear priorities, direct feedback, and structured tools to support execution

• Reliable, on-time payments with the opportunity for rate increases based on performance

• Performance incentives tied to quality and KPIs (when applicable)

• Long-term opportunity for the right person as the brand scales________________________________________



???? Why Join Property Rush?

Property Rush is built on stewardship, integrity, and growth (S.I.G.). We believe strong marketing comes from clear ownership, calm communication, and consistent follow-through. If you’re looking for a role where your creative reliability is valued and your work truly matters—you’ll feel at home here. 



???? Apply now and help our brand stand out—and perform. 

________________________________________



As part of our pre-screening process, we kindly ask you to complete both the Culture Index and Personality Assessment provided below. Completing these is required to move to the next stage. Only applicants who completed the assessments will be processed.

• Culture Index Assessment ???? 

• Personality Assessment ????

title: Product Lister (Dropshipping Google Store)
description:
We are a fast-growing e-commerce/dropshipping business with 5 active stores on Meta and TikTok. As we expand to Google, we are looking for a Google Product Lister with great attention to detail and the drive to grow with our company.



Your Role



You will be responsible for adding, optimizing, and managing product listings in our Google stores. Your work will ensure strong visibility, accurate product details, and higher conversions.



What You’ll Do



– Create images using ChatGPT



– Manually list products



– Monitor and improve existing listings



– Collaborate with marketing to align with campaigns



What We’re Looking For



– Experience with product listing in e-commerce/dropshipping)



– Detail-oriented, proactive, and full-time available



Why You’ll Love This Role



– Growth opportunities in a young and ambitious team



– A key role within our operations



– Dynamic work environment where your ideas matter



How to Apply



Send us your CV and a short motivation video why you’re the perfect fit. Don’t forget to include the word “Blauw” so we know you’ve read the full description.



Or send it is to 
Kind regards,



Ruben

title: COO ecommerce/dropshipping
description:
We’re a fast-scaling EU DTC e-commerce/dropship business seeking a hands-on COO to build and run the operational backbone of the company. After reaching €150k in month 4, we’re on track for €500k+ monthly revenue. As such, we are looking for motivated A-players who will help us level up our team and operations.



You will own day-to-day operations with an initial focus on creative production, workflow optimization, and automation. Your mandate: remove bottlenecks, scale throughput, and turn founder-driven execution into scalable systems.



Responsibilities

-Own and streamline creative production workflows

-Increase creative output while reducing cycle time

-Implement SOPs and automation across ops and tools

-Build scalable team structures and accountability

-Reduce founder dependency through systems



Ideal Profile

-Senior ops leader in DTC or performance e-commerce

-Strong with AI automations & workflow automation

-Strong with creative ops, UGC, and paid media workflows

-Systems builder, hands-on executor

-Comfortable in fast, high-accountability environments



Why Join

-Real ownership in a fast-scaling business

-Direct impact on growth and profitability

-Meaningful performance-based upside and above average base salary

title: Full Time Funnel Builder for Ecom/Dropshipping (Funnelish)
description:
We’re looking for a high-level Funnel Builder to join our team full-time. Funnels are the backbone of our business, and we need someone who can execute fast, clean, and accurately.



What You’ll Do

-Clone. adapt  and improve on competitor funnels or build from proven templates in Funnelish

-Translate funnels into multiple languages using AI

-Ensure clean, "on-brand", mobile-optimized designs

-Follow SOPs for fast, precise delivery

-Help document and improve our funnel building processes as we grow



Requirements

-Experience with Funnelish, or similar

-Strong design eye (layout, spacing, alignment)

-Comfortable using AI tools to speed up workflow

-Reliable, fast turnaround (3-4 Funnels / Day), great communication in English

-Available immediately,



Nice to have: conversion optimization basics, Shopify knowledge.



What We Offer

-Full time role 

-SOPs, templates & AI systems provided

-Consistent work and growth with a new and growing team

-Performance Incentives as we grow



How to Apply

-Send a short intro via Loom/video, funnel examples/screenshots, and include “Ready To Build" in your subject.

-Process: Paid trial funnel-> Interview->Joing our team and start building!

title: QS Cost Engineer
description:
Review and familiarize with the contract and determine the In-Scope and Out-Scope of a project

Review the provisions of the contract documents and spearhead the quantity rehash of every work item for comparison to the provision of the Approved Bill of Quantity (rehash of quantity must be with the aid of a Quantity Surveyor or staff from Operations)

Review the duties and responsibilities of the contractor and owner/client as per contract agreement

Review construction bulletins

Prepare the budgetary cost of the project and ensure that the project is within the approved budgetary cost

Responsible for the cost control and monitoring of the project (cost/risk/profit analysis, cash flow, PRS, PO, labor cost, etc.)

description:
- Drafting and finalizing prime/sub-contracts as well as various agreements

- Risk Management and compliance in terms of insurance requirements, liquidated damages

- Change orders management, monitoring of project timeline for issuance of Notice of Delays, Force Majeure or any relevant claims

- Assist the PM in resolving contractual disputes with vendors/suppliers/subcontractors/clients

title: Interior Designer
description:
Job Summary:



We are seeking a talented and creative Interior Designer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong sense of design, attention to detail, and the ability to translate client requirements into beautiful, functional spaces. You will collaborate with architects, contractors, and clients to deliver high-quality interior design solutions from concept to completion.



Key Responsibilities:



Develop creative interior design concepts that meet client requirements and align with the brand/style of the project.



Prepare mood boards, sketches, 3D visualizations, and presentations to communicate design ideas.



Select materials, finishes, furniture, lighting, and décor elements that suit the design and budget.



Create detailed drawings, plans, and specifications for contractors and vendors.



Coordinate with clients, suppliers, and contractors throughout the project lifecycle.



Manage project timelines, budgets, and resources effectively.



Stay updated on the latest design trends, materials, and technologies.



Ensure all designs comply with safety, accessibility, and building regulations.



Requirements:



Bachelor’s degree in Interior Design, Architecture, or a related field.



Proven experience as an Interior Designer (X+ years preferred) with a strong portfolio.



Proficiency in design software such as AutoCAD, SketchUp, 3ds Max, Revit, or similar.



Strong understanding of design principles, space planning, and color theory.



Excellent communication, presentation, and client management skills.



Ability to multitask, work under pressure, and meet project deadlines.



Knowledge of local building codes and regulations is a plus.

title: Customer Support Specialist - HVAC
description:
***PLEASE DO NOT APPLY IF YOU DO NOT HAVE PREVIOUS CUSTOMER SUPPORT EXPERIENCE WITHIN THE HVAC OR TRADE-RELATED INDUSTRIES, SUCH AS ROOFING, PLUMBING, SOLAR, ELECTRICAL, OR GENERAL CONSTRUCTION.***



About the Position:

We are seeking to hire a Customer Support Specialist.



The Support partners with the network of contractors and internal teams to deliver exceptional customer service experiences. The Support is responsible for taking inbound calls from customers and assisting them to the best of their ability. The role requires prior customer service experience, with a proven ability to multitask and speak to and assist a wide range of customers.



This role presents an amazing opportunity to step up to an impactful, high-growth role and take on the following responsibilities:



• Manage daily scheduling and support of contractors, emergency repair requests, maintenance visits, and other HVAC/R projects

• Answer customer and contractor inquiries by phone, text,
, and web in a timely manner

• Enter and manage work orders, jobs, and clients on a dispatch board using established processes

• Issue purchase orders for service

• Process payments

• Manage customer concerns and work to resolve them efficiently and effectively



Requirements:

• Excellent English communication skills: verbal, written, and reading – MUST

• Previous customer service experience handling phone,
, and chat support – MUST

• Prior experience in the HVAC or trade-related industry – MUST

• Ability to multitask, prioritize, and work effectively in a fast-paced environment

• Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to handle customer escalations

• Strong computer and system navigation skills

• Ability to quickly learn new tools and internal processes

• Ability to work independently while collaborating effectively with internal teams

• Strong time management and organizational skills

• Positive, proactive attitude with a focus on customer satisfaction and continuous improvement

• Previous experience in leadership roles – BIG ADVANTAGE

• Experience with Zoho tools (Zoho Desk, Zoho Books, CRM) – ADVANTAGE



Work Schedule:

• This is a full-time position in a work-from-home setup. You will be working 8.5 hours a day, 5 days a week.



TO APPLY FOR THIS POSITION, FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS BELOW:

1. Include the phrase "Customer" in your SUBJECT

2. Send a COVER LETTER with a LINK to your CV/Resume



***APPLICANTS WITHOUT CVS/RESUMES WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED***

title: Concierge/Receptionist
description:
Join Great Life Concierge Services!

title: Performance Marketing Lead (Instagram Focus)
description:
We are seeking a results-driven Performance Marketing Lead to develop, execute, and optimize high-impact digital campaigns with a strong focus on Instagram. The ideal candidate is analytical, creative, and experienced in driving measurable growth through paid social strategies. This role requires a deep understanding of Instagram advertising, audience targeting, conversion optimization, and performance analytics.



Key Responsibilities



Lead the strategy, execution, and optimization of paid campaigns on Instagram.

Develop data-driven marketing plans to increase brand awareness, engagement, leads, and conversions.

Manage advertising budgets to maximize ROI and achieve performance targets.

Conduct A/B testing on creatives, copy, targeting, and bidding strategies.

Analyze campaign performance metrics (CTR, CPC, CPA, ROAS) and provide actionable insights.

Collaborate with the creative team to produce high-converting ad content tailored for Instagram.

Monitor market trends, competitor activity, and platform updates to ensure competitive advantage.

Prepare detailed performance reports for stakeholders with strategic recommendations.

Ensure tracking and analytics tools (e.g., Meta Ads Manager, Google Analytics) are properly implemented.

Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or related field.

3+ years of experience in performance marketing or paid social media advertising.

Proven expertise in Instagram Ads and Meta Business Suite.

Strong analytical skills and experience interpreting campaign data.

Experience with conversion tracking, pixel implementation, and retargeting strategies.

Excellent communication and leadership skills.

Ability to manage multiple campaigns in a fast-paced environment.

title: Video Editor
description:
We're looking for a creative Video Editor who can bring our content to life across multiple platforms — from polished YouTube videos and luxury watch tours to engaging TikToks, Reels, and Shorts.



What You'll Be Creating:



Long-Form Content

YouTube videos, including faceless content and cinematic luxury watch tour videos

Polished, story-driven content that keeps viewers engaged from start to finish



Short-Form Content

TikToks, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, and social media clips

Bite-sized content repurposed from longer videos, optimized for each platform



Post-Production & Polish

Motion graphics, subtitles, transitions, animations, sound effects, and music

Color correction, grading, audio clean-up, and overall quality refinement

Content optimized for platform-specific best practices and audience retention



Creative Collaboration & Strategy

Work with our creative team to understand goals and bring ideas to life

Craft compelling narratives with strong pacing and visual storytelling

Contribute creative ideas for themes, visual direction, and storytelling approaches

Stay on top of platform trends and algorithm best practices



Organization & Workflow

Manage media assets, project files, and working libraries efficiently

Handle multiple projects simultaneously while meeting deadlines

Export videos in various formats, resolutions, and aspect ratios for different platforms



Who You Are:

-Experienced in both long-form and short-form editing, with a portfolio or demo reel that shows your range

-Proficient in major editing software like Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve, or After Effects

-Strong storyteller with an eye for pacing, rhythm, and keeping audiences engaged

-Platform-savvy — you understand what works on YouTube vs. TikTok vs. Instagram Reels

-Detail-oriented with strong organizational skills and consistent branding

-Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment with tight deadlines

-Experienced in using AI tools to streamline editing workflows, enhance content, or generate creative assets, including tools such as: ChatGPT, Perplexity,  Descript, etc.

-Familiar with AI voice and audio tools such as ElevenLabs for voiceovers, narration, or audio enhancement



-Bonus points if you have motion graphics skills, animation experience, or understanding of content analytics and platform algorithms



Ready to Apply?



I'd love to see what you can create! To help me understand if we're a great fit, please share the following:



1. Your DISC test - 
/disc-personality-test/ - Please send a link to your results.

2. Your personality test - 
/free-personality-test - Please send a link to your results.

3. Your updated resume, showcasing your most relevant experience.

4. Typing Test - Take this typing test (30 seconds):


p?minutes=0.5&textfile=0&mode=sent&result_url=
p&bt=0&gt=normal



5. A video or videos that answer the following. Feel free to give as much information and context as possible. Also please make sure that, when you submit the video(s) links, they are in public, viewable format.



a. Tell us about yourself. Hobbies/passions. What are your career/life goals and in what amount of time?

b. Show off your work setup (computer/laptop, monitor(s), speakers, lights, etc) and tech setup - browser you use, other tech/platforms you use

c. Think of one objective you’ve had to complete in your current or previous role. Explain what metric(s) were you measured on (time spent, money saved, traffic/engagement/leads/sales, etc). Reverse engineer said objective with the target measurement in mind. Map out the process that you came up with in google docs, google sheets, or in Canva as a visual representation. How could you have made it easier/faster/better using AI?



I'm looking forward to seeing your work and learning more about you. If you have any questions before applying, feel free to reach out!

title: Content Producer
description:
Content Producer (Editor & Social Media Manager)



Company: Tokyo Campervans

Employment Type: Full-Time (40 hours per week)

Trial Period: 2 weeks (Part-Time)



About Tokyo Campervans



Tokyo Campervans is a growing camper van rental company based in Japan. We create content around van life, travel in Japan, nature, road trips, and practical travel tips. As a small but ambitious team, we value creativity, initiative, and fresh ideas.



We’re looking for a Content Producer who is both a skilled video editor and an organized social media manager, someone who doesn’t just execute tasks, but actively contributes ideas and helps shape our content strategy.



Role Overview



This role combines video editing and social media management. You’ll be responsible for producing and publishing engaging short-form and long-form content across our social platforms.



This position is ideal for a creative person who enjoys experimenting with new editing styles, storytelling approaches, and trends, and who wants to play a key role in growing a travel brand.



Because we are a small company, responsibilities may evolve based on business needs.



Current Responsibilities

Video Editing



Edit short-form content (Reels, Shorts, TikToks, LinkdIn Videos)



Edit long-form content (YouTube, travel guides, van tours, etc.)



Add subtitles, motion graphics, music, and strong written hooks



Experiment with new editing styles and formats



Optimize content for engagement and audience retention



Social Media Management



Write engaging video descriptions and captions in English



Schedule and publish content across platforms



Manage and organize content schedule



Maintain consistent branding and tone of voice



Research trends and suggest new content ideas



Creative Contribution



Pitch original video ideas and content concepts



Suggest improvements to storytelling and structure



Stay up to date with social media trends and apply them to our niche



Help evolve and strengthen the Tokyo Campervans brand voice



Requirements



Strong video editing skills (short-form experience required)



Solid understanding of social media platforms and trends



Excellent written and spoken English (fluency required, as English is the primary language of our company and audience)



Ability to work independently and take initiative



Creative mindset with the confidence to contribute ideas



Bonus if you are interested in:



Japan



Travel and road trips



Nature and outdoor lifestyle



Campervans / van life culture



Compensation



Trial Period: 2 weeks, part-time at ¥500 (Japanese yen) per hour



Full-Time Role: 40 hours per week at ¥800 (Japanese yen) per hour (following successful trial)



Why Join Us?



Creative freedom to experiment and innovate



Opportunity to shape the voice of a growing travel brand



Hands-on role in a small, fast-moving company



Work with content centered around travel, Japan, and adventure



Content Producer (Video Editor & Social Media Manager)

title: Technical Customer Support & Product Demo Specialist
description:
is an all-in-one business platform used by freelancers, agencies, and small service businesses to run client work. Proposals, contracts, invoicing, projects, automation, scheduling, client portals,
 - all in one system instead of scattered tools.



Because customers run their actual business inside Plutio, support isn’t basic “how do I click this.” It often involves technical setups, troubleshooting, debugging workflows, and helping customers configure things correctly.



We’re looking for someone technical enough to handle that confidently:



- Handle customer support (chat, tickets, calls when needed)

- Run live demos showing real workflows, not scripted tours

- Troubleshoot domain setups (DNS, CNAME, TXT, SPF, DKIM, DMARC)

- Help customers configure custom
 sending (SMTP, deliverability issues)

- Diagnose automation issues and workflow edge cases

- Investigate bugs and provide clear reproduction steps

- Test new features before release and give feedback

- Help customers structure projects, invoices, contracts, client portals properly





You don’t need to be a developer, but you must be comfortable with technical concepts, for example:



- Custom domain configuration

- DNS records (A, CNAME, TXT)

-
 deliverability basics (SPF, DKIM, DMARC)

- SMTP configuration and troubleshooting

- API/webhook basics (nice to have)

- Browser debugging basics (console errors, network tab)

- Understanding SaaS workflows and integrations



If terms like these sound foreign, this role probably isn’t the right fit.

title: High-Energy Appointment Setter | Sales Specialist | Performance Coach
description:
"About Me"

"I am a high-energy Sales Specialist and Taekwondo Coach with ADHD, which I leverage as a professional superpower. My neurodivergence allows me to hyper-focus on high-volume tasks like outbound calling and lead generation without losing momentum. I thrive in fast-paced environments where quick thinking and decisive action are required. While I maintain a conversational level of English, my ability to connect with people and my relentless 'martial arts' discipline make me a top performer. I don't just work the hours; I hyper-focus until the targets are met.



"Skills" as ADHD person

Hyper-focus Driven Outreach: Able to maintain intense concentration during high-volume cold-calling sessions (100+ calls/day).



Rapid Problem Solving: Naturally adept at thinking "outside the box" to handle customer objections and find creative ways to close deals.



High-Energy Resilience: Possess a natural "battery" that stays charged throughout the night shift, ensuring consistent performance from start to finish.



Adaptability: Quickly switch between tasks and software platforms without losing focus on the ultimate goal: booking appointments.

Managed end-to-end sales for a high-volume reselling business (shoes and consumer goods).

 Marketplace and social media platforms.

Communication: Translated complex movements into simple, actionable English instructions for beginners.



Mindset: Utilized martial arts discipline to manage training schedules and student progress independently.

Executed marketing strategies to increase lead generation for retail products.



Analysis: Researched market trends to identify profitable opportunities, directly increasing monthly sales volume.



Outreach: Conducted direct messaging and cold outreach to potential buyers to build a consistent sales pipeline.

title: Experienced Bookkeeper
description:
Mabuhay!



We’re looking for a skilled, experienced Filipino Accountant/Bookkeeper who knows Australian accounting standards, has handled Australian clients, and can support a fast-moving digital marketing agency with clean, reliable numbers and smart financial insights. This role requires strong Xero skills, great attention to detail, and clear English communication.



At Titan Marketer, we run performance marketing (YouTube, Google, Meta), funnels, and tracking for clients, mostly service-based businesses. We’re growing fast, so we need someone who can keep our financials accurate, up to date, and decision-ready.



If you’re ready to be part of a driven team and help keep the engine running behind the scenes, we’d love to hear from you!



What You’ll Do

-Manage day-to-day bookkeeping and reconciliations in Xero

-Maintain clean and accurate financial records (bank feeds, coding, receipts, invoices)

-Prepare and review P&L, balance sheet, cashflow reports

-Support month-end close (accruals, prepayments, adjusting journals as needed)

-Ensure compliance with Australian accounting practices

-Liaise with our team and (when needed) external accountant/BAS agent



Requirements

-Proven experience working with Australian clients (agency or service-based is a big plus)

-Strong understanding of Australian accounting standards and best practice

-High proficiency in Xero

-Strong written and spoken English

-Ability to work independently and manage time well



Work Hours & Compensation

Hourly Rate: $4 to $6 USD (based on experience)

Hours: approx. Part-Time (to start)



This Must Be Supplied To Be Considered

-A 1–2 minute face-to-camera introduction video (Loom is fine). If you already have one, submit that.

--Ideas on what to include:

---A quick intro about you

---Your experience with Australian clients + Xero

---Why you’re a great fit for a marketing agency

---A result you’re proud of (speed, accuracy, clean-up, reporting, etc.)



To Confirm You’ve Read This

Please include the words “finance guru” in your response.



Interview Process: You’ll need a Zoom account plus a working webcam and microphone. We’ll start with a text chat and may move to a video call.

title: YouTube Operations Manager (More than Full-Time)
description:
Summary

Motion Media operates multiple faceless YouTube channels. We are hiring a full-time YouTube Operations Manager to build and run a predictable, high-quality production system across multiple channels so the founder is not needed in daily operations. This role owns planning, execution, tracking, quality control, and team accountability.



Key Responsibilities

• Own daily operations for assigned YouTube channels and ensure consistent output

• Manage the production pipeline end-to-end: topics ? scripts ? edits ? thumbnails ? upload ? QA

• Create, document, and enforce SOPs so processes are repeatable and scalable

• Maintain trackers for tasks, owners, deadlines, and blockers

• Ensure deadlines are met through follow-ups, prioritization, and blocker removal

• Quality check thumbnails and other deliverables, and provide clear feedback to improve CTR and clarity

• Produce weekly operations reports every Monday: output, delays, blockers, staffing needs, and next-week plan

• Onboard new hires and ensure they become productive quickly

• Implement and run basic performance management: warnings, accountability, and replacement pipeline for repeated underperformance

• Communicate daily with the team via 
 and keep the founder informed through concise updates



Performance Outcomes

• Within 14–21 days: fully independent on assigned channels, including topic creation, thumbnail QC, team familiarity, and onboarding

• By end of March: weekly ops report delivered every Monday without reminders

• By end of April: founder time in operations under 2 hours per day

• By end of June: founder time in operations under 1 hour per day

• By end of May: SOP library of 6 or more SOPs, each with checklist, owner, and definition of done

• By end of May: performance management system implemented, including warning process and replacement pipeline



Required Qualifications

• Experience managing workflows, operations, or teams in a fast-paced environment

• Strong understanding of SOPs, documentation, and structured processes

• Comfortable tracking KPIs and using data to report progress

• Strong organizational skills and ability to manage multiple moving parts

• High standards and attention to detail

• Direct communicator who can address underperformance respectfully but firmly

title: Admin Assistant/PA for Australian Med Tech Firm
description:
We are seeking a highly capable, detail-oriented Administration Assistant to join our rapidly expanding technology firm in the personal injury space as a Workflow Coordinator. The ideal candidate will be responsible for providing essential administrative support to Medical Experts using our practice management software, ensuring efficient communication and task prioritisation. This role would suit someone who thrives in a fast paced environment, can make confident decisions and can manage their time effectively.



About Us

We are a medico-legal technology business supporting Medical Experts across Australia in delivering high-quality independent medical assessments and reports. We provide streamlined administrative, workflow and technology solutions that enable our experts to focus on their clinical expertise while we manage the operational efficiency of their practices. As we continue to grow, we are building a high-performing team committed to accuracy, professionalism and exceptional service delivery.



The Role

As a Workflow Coordinator, your primary focus is to support our medical experts and develop relationships with our referrer partners, as you will serve as the bridge between them. You will act as a central point of support for allocated Medical Experts, ensuring their reports, schedules, and administrative workflows are managed accurately and efficiently. This role is critical to maintaining high service standards, meeting strict deadlines, and delivering professionally formatted medico-legal documentation. You will work independently within a structured process-driven environment, balancing competing priorities while maintaining exceptional attention to detail.





Key Responsibilities

Prepare, format, proofread, and finalise complex medico-legal reports (advanced Microsoft Word skills essential)

Dispatch reports via our practice management platform

Create and issue invoices accurately and promptly

Manage bookings, confirmations, and appointment rescheduling

Monitor workflow queues to ensure deadlines are met

Provide dedicated administrative support to allocated Medical Experts

Manage inbound and outbound calls professionally

Prioritise urgent matters and exercise sound judgment

Maintain accurate records within the practice management system



Essential Skills & Experience

Minimum 3+ years’ experience as an Administrative Assistant, PA, or EA (professional services, legal, medical, or consulting environment highly regarded)

Bachelor's Degree and/or background in the medical industry a plus but not essential

Advanced Microsoft Word skills (including complex formatting, styles, headings, tables of contents, track changes, document consistency, and layout control)

Exceptional written and verbal English communication skills (CEFR Level C1 or C2; IELTS 8+ preferred)

Strong organisational skills with the ability to manage multiple priorities

High attention to detail and commitment to accuracy

Confident decision-making and ability to work autonomously

Comfortable working in a structured, deadline-driven environment



Personal Attributes:

High level of integrity, maturity and professionalism

Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to build effective working relationships with medical experts

Confident and capable of working independently, exercising sound judgment, takes accountability and is adabtable

Exceptional attention to detail, ensuring accuracy across all communication and documentation

Adaptable and comfortable working in a dynamic, fast-paced environment

Excellent written and verbal communication skills

Strong time management skills, with the ability to prioritise and manage multiple responsibilities effectively

Technically capable, with the ability to learn and navigate new software systems quickly and efficiently



Technical & Work-From-Home Requirements

Reliable high-speed internet connection (minimum 150 Mbps download)

Quiet, private workspace free from distractions

Backup internet and power solutions

Access to alternative workspace (e.g., co-working space) if required

Demonstrate capacity to have a secure working-from-home environment without distractions, including suitable childcare arrangements during working hours



Working Hours & Benefits

Full-time: Monday to Friday, 9:00am – 6:00pm (Australian Eastern Standard Time)

Work-from-home position

Paid leave entitlements

13th-month payment

HMO coverage following successful completion of 6-month probation



This is a rewarding opportunity to play a key role in supporting a growing network of Medical Experts within their medico-legal practices. Your work will directly contribute to the quality, professionalism, and efficiency of their consulting services. If you are a proactive, highly detail-oriented professional who thrives in a fast-paced environment and can manage a high volume of complex administrative tasks with accuracy and confidence, we encourage you to apply.



To apply, please submit your resume and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience based on the criteria, and why you are the ideal candidate for this position. Applications without a cover letter will not be reviewed. Please also include at least two references and their current contact information.

title: AI Automation Specialist (n8n, LLMs, Shopify) - E-commerce Operations
description:
Job Description:



We are looking for a highly skilled AI Automation Specialist to spearhead automation across our entire business.



While your first major focus will be fully streamlining our customer service department by building intelligent
 response systems, this role expands far beyond that. You will be responsible for analyzing, architecting, and automating other critical backend systems across the company.



--



Key Responsibilities:



Design, build, and deploy AI-driven automated response systems for our customer service team.

Audit other internal company systems and build automation logic to improve operational efficiency across various departments.

Integrate LLMs (like Claude) with our existing tech stack and e-commerce platforms.

Create robust, scalable automation workflows using tools like n8n, Make, and Zapier.

Connect and automate processes utilizing the Shopify API.



--



Required Skills & Qualifications:



Strong coding experience (Python, JavaScript, or similar).

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, IT, or a highly related technical field.

Proven experience with n8n, Claude Code, and other LLM platforms.

Hands-on experience building logic with Make, Zapier, or similar automation platforms.

Prior experience working with the Shopify API is highly preferred.

Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to map out complex logic for diverse business systems.



--



How to Apply:

To ensure you've read this entire post, please use the phrase 'AutomationExpert123' as your subject line. In your message, please briefly answer the screening questions listed below:



1. Besides customer service, what other AI automation systems did you implement in similar businesses like ours? What systems did you connect?

2. Have you worked with the Shopify API before? If yes, please briefly describe a specific automation or integration you built using it.

3. Walk me through a complex automation workflow you built using n8n or Make. What was the problem, and how did your logic solve it?

4. Describe your experience using Claude Code or other LLMs for text-based automation. How do you handle edge cases or "hallucinations" in a live production environment?

5. The AI field moves fast. How do you stay updated with industry changes, and what was the last new automation tool or technique you taught yourself?

6. What programming languages are you most proficient in when building custom integrations, and how many years of experience do you have with them?

title: Direct-Response Video Editor (E-commerce, Meta VSLs & UGC Ads, Beauty Brand)
description:
We're a direct-response creative company that scales our own DTC brands to 7-8 figures and we’re seeking an experienced Direct Response Video Editor.



The ideal candidate has a strong understanding of direct-response advertising and how high-converting video creatives drive performance. Your core responsibility will be turning proven scripts into ads that build emotion, hold attention, and drive the sale.



Your Role:

As a Video Editor, you’ll play a key role in scaling our ad performance. You’ll help produce high-quality video ads that convert, from short-form UGC to long-form VSLs (5 minutes+).



You’ll work across multiple formats, turning voiceovers, talking-head footage, AI clips, and raw UGC into clear, emotional, conversion-driven ads. You’ll create variations based on hooks, intros, and messaging angles, generate new clips using AI tools, source relevant content online, and collaborate closely with our Creative Strategist and editing team to test and iterate quickly.



Ideal Candidate:

- At least 1 year of experience editing direct-response video ads

- Strong pacing, storytelling, structure, and attention-retention instincts

- Proficient with video editing software

- Fluent in English, with strong grammar and accurate subtitles

- High attention to detail

- Fast communicator with consistent delivery

- Adaptable and deadline-driven

- Collaborative and open to feedback



Requirements:

You are proficient with industry-standard editing tools such as Adobe Premiere Pro. Your skill level allows you to produce polished, professional ads designed to perform on paid platforms. Bonus if you have basic motion graphics or After Effects skills.



You’ll collaborate closely with our Creative Strategist and editors to bring concepts to life. Expect structured briefs, rapid feedback loops, and ongoing testing of new angles, hooks, and visual approaches. You understand what performs, and you iterate until it hits.



What You’ll Do:

1. Attend weekly tea
etings with senior Creative Strategists and Video Editors to align on performance and creative direction  

2. Edit short-form UGC and long-form VSLs (5 minutes+) for
 and Instagram  

3. Turn voiceovers, talking-heads, AI clips, and raw UGC into clear, emotional, conversion-driven ads  

4. Create new clips using AI tools and source relevant content from the internet  

5. Build variations based on hooks, intros, and messaging angles  

6. Study high-performing ads from other markets to find repeatable patterns  

7. Stay up-to-date with new AI trends and tools to improve quality and speed  

8. Participate in weekly performance reviews to track results and iterate on what’s working  



You Shouldn’t Apply If:

- You want a normal 9–5. This role is demanding and requires an all-in mindset

- You are overly attached to your ideas or struggle to take creative feedback

- You’re looking for part-time work while juggling multiple clients

- You can’t handle pressure and fast-paced deadlines



What’s In It For You:

- Monthly retainer + performance bonuses tied to results

- Access to live ad account data to guide your edits

- Work inside our structured Notion-based creative system

- Full onboarding and training

- The chance to grow with a portfolio of DTC brands as we scale further



Please apply via our website: 



We will only consider candidates who have filled out the form. Looking forward to your application!

title: Shopify Store Manager / Dropshipping Specialist (We Have Factory - You Bring Traffic) Work Mode
description:
Shopify Store Manager / Dropshipping Specialist (We Have Factory - You Bring Traffic)

Work Mode

100% Remote (Work from Home)

Schedule

9:00 AM - 6:00 PM (China/Philippines Time) – fixed day shift, no graveyard shifts required

Key Responsibilities (The A-Z of Your Role)

1. Product Research (Hunter Mindset)

Spend daily time researching and identifying "Winning Products" using tools such as Minea, AdSpy, PipiAds, or TikTok Creative Center. You must have a clear understanding of why a product sells, including market demand, target audience, and competitive advantages.

2. Content Creation (Video is King)

Create high-quality, engaging video content – not just download and repost. Use tools like CapCut or Canva to edit videos and craft "Scroll-Stopping" hooks tailored for TikTok and Instagram Reels, designed to capture audience attention and drive clicks.

3. Shopify Store Optimization

Write high-converting product descriptions (strong copywriting skills required), import and manage product reviews, and optimize landing pages to improve conversion rates and user experience.

4. Traffic Generation

Develop and manage organic social media posting plans to build brand awareness and drive free traffic. Experience with 
 Ads and
 Ads is a significant plus, as it will help accelerate store growth.

Who You Are (Ideal Candidate)

Experience > Degree: We prioritize practical experience over academic credentials. You must have prior experience running a Shopify store (even if you faced challenges – we want to hear what you learned from those experiences).

Data-Driven: You understand key metrics such as CTR (Click-Through Rate), CPC (Cost Per Click), and ROAS (Return on Ad Spend), and use data to make informed decisions about product selection and traffic strategies.

Resourceful & Proactive: You are self-motivated, don’t wait for step-by-step instructions, and actively find solutions to challenges. You thrive in a dynamic environment where you can take ownership of the store’s growth.

Technical Requirements (Non-Negotiable)

Please only apply if you agree to the following requirements – no exceptions:

Screen Monitoring: We use time-tracking software with screen capture (e.g., Time Doctor / Hubstaff) to ensure productivity and accountability. If you are uncomfortable with this, please do not apply.

Backup Power & Internet: Priority is given to candidates with a Power Station/Generator and Backup Internet. Consistent performance is critical for this role, and we cannot tolerate disruptions due to power or internet outages.

Why Join Us?

???? Salary + Profit Share: A stable base salary to cover your living expenses, plus a generous commission based on the store’s profit – the more you grow 
, the more you earn.

????? Unfair Advantage: You get to sell products with the best logistics backing in the industry – no more worrying about supplier issues, shipping delays, or low margins. Focus solely on growth.

???? Day Shift: Work during normal business hours (9:00 AM - 6:00 PM China/Philippines Time) – no late nights or graveyard shifts, allowing for a healthy work-life balance.

???? Growth Opportunity: Be part of a brand’s journey from 0 to 1, with the freedom to implement your ideas and directly impact the store’s success. This is a chance to build your portfolio and advance your career in dropshipping.

How to Apply (IMPORTANT)

To be considered for an interview, you must prove you are detail-oriented and not a bot. Please follow the instructions exactly:

 Requirements

????
 Subject Line: "I can grow Lumitiny - [Your Name]"

???? Send your application to:

 Body)

Your OnlineJobs.ph Profile Link (if applicable).

The Test (MANDATORY): Answer the following question clearly: If you had to pick one product to test on TikTok right now, what would it be and why? Please include a link to the product or a competitor’s video to support your answer.

Optional Follow-Up

After sending your
, you may contact us via WhatsApp for faster follow-up:
