title: Customer Support & Retention Associate
description:
WE NEED FULL-TIME EMPLOYEES. NO OTHER JOBS. IF YOU ARE WORKING FOR OTHER COMPANIES, PLEASE DO NOT APPLY. 



Read until the very end.



Working Schedule: Tuesday-Saturday, 4AM-12NN PH time or 10 PM to 6 AM PH Time, including occasional weekends or holidays as needed



Reports To: HR/CS Director



Role Overview

As a Customer Support & Retention Associate, you’ll be the first point of contact for our customers—resolving inquiries, handling order issues, and ensuring a smooth experience across our DTC brands. You’ll manage tickets via Freshdesk and provide support across
, chat, and phone, delivering timely, accurate, and empathetic service.



Beyond support, this role plays a key part in customer retention and subscription management—identifying save opportunities, reducing churn, and protecting recurring revenue.



This role is ideal for someone with strong omnichannel customer service experience 
, chat, and phone), excellent written and verbal English communication skills, and the ability to manage multiple inquiries efficiently while maintaining professionalism, accuracy, and a solutions-first mindset.



Key Responsibilities

-Respond promptly and professionally to customer inquiries via Freshdesk 
 and chat).

-Handle order updates, returns, exchanges, refunds, and product inquiries with accuracy and efficiency.

-Manage subscription-related requests including cancellations, skips, billing updates, and plan modifications.

-Proactively identify opportunities to save subscriptions by offering solutions such as product education, usage guidance, alternative options, flexible shipping schedules, or applicable promotions.

-Support customer retention efforts by reducing refunds and cancellations through thoughtful problem-solving and brand-aligned save strategies.

-Escalate high-risk churn cases when appropriate while attempting first-level save efforts.

-Coordinate with internal teams and 3PL partners to resolve shipping, fulfillment, or inventory-related concerns.

-Maintain accurate and detailed customer interaction records in Freshdesk.

-Identify recurring issues and provide feedback to improve FAQs, macros, workflows, or product education.

-Contribute to improving CSAT, retention rate, subscription save rate, and overall customer lifetime value.

-Meet or exceed performance targets including response time, resolution rate, customer satisfaction, and retention metrics.

-Perform other customer experience–related tasks as assigned.

(Responsibilities are not limited to the above and may evolve based on team needs and performance.)



Requirements (Plug-and-Play Skills)

-Minimum 2 years of customer service experience, with at least 1 year in non-voice support 
 or chat).

-Familiarity with Freshdesk, Zendesk, or similar helpdesk platforms.

-Excellent written English—clear, empathetic, and professional tone.

-At least 40 words per minute with high accuracy.

-Multitasking & Focus

-Can manage multiple tickets and maintain quality under pressure.

-Integrity & Accountability

-Reliable, proactive, and able to work independently in a remote environment.





Nice-to-Have Skills

-Experience with Shopify, Amazon Seller Central, or TikTok Shop

-Familiarity with Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets)

-Understanding of CSAT, response time, and resolution KPIs

-Experience working with 3PL or fulfillment partners

-Pet owner (or has experience caring for pets), with a strong understanding of pet owners’ concerns and emotional connection to their pets.



Why Join Pearl West Group

-Be part of a fast-growing eCommerce team managing multiple DTC brands.

-Gain hands-on exposure to Freshdesk and real customer experience operations.

-Fully remote role with performance-based incentives.

-Opportunity for promotion or full-time employment based on performance.



Application Process

) -- WE DO NOT READ MESSAGES IN ONLINEJOB'S INBOX

) - NO ONLINE ASSESSMENT = AUTO-REJECT

title: Affiliate Publisher Partnerships Coordinator
description:
Work setup: Full-time, remote



Company Overview

Pearl West is building the future of consumer brands — differently.



We operate like a mini-Unilever: a lean, performance-driven team that builds and scales brands like startups, backed by private-equity-level capital and discipline.



We own and operate six consumer brands generating $40M+ in annual revenue, with additional acquisitions ahead. Each brand follows a focused 3-year scale-and-exit playbook, powered by centralized growth, creative, media, product, and operations teams.



This is operator-led brand building — not “scale and pray.” Decisions are data-backed. Execution is fast. Results directly impact the P&L.



If you want hands-on ownership and exposure to how modern e-commerce brands are built and exited, Pearl West is where you grow.



Role Overview

The Affiliate Publisher Partnerships Coordinator is an execution-focused role responsible for sourcing, coordinating, and managing publisher-led affiliate partnerships, with a strong emphasis on article-based placements, media publishers, and content sites that drive profitable Amazon revenue.



This role centers on working with publishers who create written content (reviews, listicles, comparison articles, and brand features). You will manage outreach, messaging, campaign setup, and performance tracking across Levanta and Wayward.



Experience working with influencers or creators is a plus; however, this role is primarily focused on the publishing and content affiliate ecosystem. Influencer initiatives may be involved on an as-needed basis but are not the main responsibility of the role.



Key Responsibilities

Core Responsibilities (Publisher-Focused)

Source, qualify, and coordinate affiliate publishers, editorial sites, blogs, and media partners

Lead outreach and communication with publishers regarding article placements, brand features, and affiliate content

Own day-to-day messaging with publishers covering placements, content requirements, links, commissions, and timelines

Coordinate and execute affiliate campaigns across Levanta and Wayward

Support and manage paid article placements and commission-based publishing partnerships

Onboard new publisher partners, ensuring correct affiliate tracking, links, and commission setup

Review live articles to ensure brand accuracy, proper positioning, and correct Amazon link routing

Monitor publisher placements for compliance and performance

Maintain accurate tracking of affiliate performance, commissions, and margins in Google Sheets

Track publisher-driven Amazon revenue and flag optimization or scale opportunities

Support evaluation of publisher performance to inform scaling, pausing, or renegotiation decisions

Collaborate closely with the Affiliate Manager to execute and optimize publisher-led affiliate initiative

Nice-to-Have / Supplemental Responsibilities (Not Core)

Coordinate messaging with creators or influencers when they are part of a broader affiliate placement

Support creator-based affiliate campaigns or Amazon Creator Connections when applicable

Assist with light content coordination or copy review for affiliate articles when needed

Provide input on messaging or positioning based on publisher feedback (not brand PR

Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)

Growth in publisher-driven affiliate Amazon revenue

Number of qualified, revenue-producing publishing partners onboarded

Accuracy and reliability of affiliate tracking and reporting

Speed and consistency of execution across Levanta and Wayward

Contribution margin and commission efficienc



Success Benchmarks (30–60–90 Days)

First 30 Days

Fully onboarded into Pearl West brands, tools, and affiliate platforms

Independently executing publisher outreach, messaging, and coordination

Demonstrating strong attention to detail in article review, tracking, and link accuracy

 

60 Days

Actively managing multiple publisher partnerships and live articles

Supporting affiliate campaigns across Levanta and Wayward

Identifying early performance trends and optimization opportunities

 

90 Days

Owning execution of publisher affiliate campaigns end-to-end

Consistently driving profitable, scalable publisher-led affiliate revenue

Proactively proposing new publisher partners and article placement opportunitie



Required Skills & Qualifications

Required

Experience working with publishers, editorial sites, blogs, or media platforms

Familiarity with content publishing and article-based brand placements

Strong experience with outreach, messaging, and partner coordination

Understanding of performance-based partnerships and commission structures

Strong proficiency in Google Sheets for tracking and reporting

Highly organized, detail-oriented, and execution-focused

Comfortable operating in a performance-driven, results-accountable environmen



Nice to Have (Plus)

Affiliate marketing experience

Experience with Levanta, Wayward, or similar affiliate platforms

Copywriting or editorial experience, especially for digital content

Influencer or creator partnership experience

Amazon seller or Amazon affiliate ecosystem experience



Who Should Apply?

? You have experience working with publishers or content-driven affiliate partners

? You understand how articles and editorial placements drive affiliate revenue

? You’re comfortable managing outreach, follow-ups, and execution

? You thrive in fast-moving, execution-heavy environments



???? You’re primarily a PR, brand, or influencer marketing specialist

???? You’re new to the publishing or affiliate ecosystem

???? You prefer awareness-focused work over revenue accountability



Why Join Us?

Work directly on Amazon brands actively scaling

Real ownership over publisher-led affiliate execution

Clear expectations, fast feedback, and measurable impact

Performance-first culture with zero politics

Your work directly affects revenue, margins, and exit



Compensation & Benefits

$1,000–$1,200 USD per month, based on experience and performance

Performance-based bonuses tied to affiliate revenue and profitability

Full-time, remote work setup

Paid time off and company-recognized holidays

Long-term growth opportunities as the affiliate channel scale



To apply, kindly send your resume through this link: 



No submissions here will be entertained!

title: Fun & Energetic ESL Tutor for 10-Year-Old Boy (Anime/Ultraman Fan) – Long-term
description:
Fun & Energetic ESL Tutor for 10-Year-Old Boy (Anime/Ultraman Fan) – Long-term

Company/Client

We are recruiting on behalf of a VIP family seeking a long-term, dedicated ESL tutor for their 10-year-old son. The family values a fun, confidence-driven approach to language learning and is committed to supporting the tutor with a stable, long-term cooperation.

Work Mode

100% Remote (Work from Home)

Schedule

Frequency: 2–3 sessions per week (long-term commitment required; short-term applicants will not be considered)

Time: Evenings or weekends (Beijing Time / BJT) – flexible within these windows to align with the family’s schedule

Commitment: Strictly long-term (minimum 6 months preferred)

Compensation

Hourly Rate (USD) – Commensurate with teaching experience, ESL expertise, and ability to engage high-energy children. This is a stable, long-term role with a VIP family, offering consistent hours and reliable payment.

About the Student

The student is a 10-year-old boy with a vibrant, outgoing personality in daily life, but he is shy and lacks confidence when speaking English. His interests are the core of his engagement, and we leverage these to make learning fun and low-pressure:

Key Interests: Ultraman, Detective Conan, anime, cartoons, and superheroes

Learning Trait: Responds best to interactive, game-based, and interest-driven activities (not traditional textbook learning)

Teaching Goal (EXTREMELY IMPORTANT)

Phase 1 has only ONE core goal: Build the student’s English speaking confidence. This takes priority over all other aspects of language learning.

? No strict grammar correction (mistakes are encouraged as part of learning)

? No textbook-style, rigid teaching methods

? Encourage free speaking, even if imperfect

? Create a safe, judgment-free environment where mistakes are acceptable

? Use the student’s interests (anime, Ultraman, role-play, characters) to spark conversation and keep him talking

Your core role: Make English feel fun, safe, and rewarding – helping him feel brave enough to speak up without fear.

Role Overview

We are seeking an ESL tutor who understands that confidence comes before correctness. You are not just teaching English – you are mentoring a child to build self-assurance, using his passions to make language learning enjoyable. This is a one-on-one role focused entirely on this student, allowing you to tailor lessons to his interests and learning pace.

Job Requirements (Non-Negotiable)

1. Accent & Pronunciation

Neutral American accent (mandatory)

Clear, natural pronunciation that is easy for a 10-year-old to understand

? Strong regional accents (of any kind) will not be considered

2. Experience with High-Energy Boys

Proven experience teaching or interacting with boys (preferably 8–12 years old)

Ability to manage high energy and short attention spans

Skill in gamifying lessons, using role-play, and keeping classes highly interactive to maintain engagement

3. Technical Stability (Hard Requirement)

Due to remote teaching needs (especially for tutors in the Philippines), the following are non-negotiable:

Home Fiber Internet (wired connection preferred) to ensure stable video calls

Backup power supply (to ensure classes continue during power outages)

Quiet, distraction-free teaching environment (no background noise, pets, or interruptions)

?? Tutors with unstable internet or power need not apply.

4. Anime / Pop Culture Knowledge (Strong Plus)

Familiarity with Ultraman, Japanese anime (e.g., Detective Conan), or superheroes

Ability to build common ground with the student through his interests – this helps break the ice and significantly increases engagement

Why This Role?

???? One-on-one teaching with a single student – focus on building a meaningful connection and tracking his progress

???? Creative, interest-based teaching – no exam focus, no rigid curricula; you get to design fun, engaging lessons

???? Long-term cooperation with a VIP family – stable hours, reliable payment, and the chance to make a lasting impact

???? Directly influence a child’s confidence and growth – see him grow from shy to confident in speaking English

Required Application Materials

To prove you are detail-oriented and not a bot, please prepare the following materials and follow the instructions exactly:

Updated CV / Resume (highlighting ESL teaching experience, experience with children, and any relevant interests)

OnlineJobs.ph profile link (if applicable)

1-minute voice or video recording (MANDATORY – see instructions below)

Confirmation Statement (copy & paste exactly – see below)

Recording Instructions (MANDATORY)

Imagine you are talking directly to the 10-year-old student. In your recording, please:

Briefly introduce yourself (in a friendly, warm tone suitable for a child)

Ask him one question about either Ultraman OR his favorite superhero (to show you can connect with his interests)

?? Applications without this recording will be automatically ignored.

Confirmation Statement (Copy & Paste Required)

Please include this exact statement in your
:

“I confirm that I have fiber internet, proper teaching equipment, backup power/internet, and I accept screen monitoring.”

How to Apply

????
 Subject Line: “I Can Build His Confidence – [Your Full Name]”

???? Send your application to

, you may contact us via WhatsApp for faster follow-up:

title: Brand Manager CEOR
description:
JOB TITLE: Brand Manager (Shopify + Paid Ads + AI Product Photography) — CEOR (UK Travel Suitcase Brand)



Hours: 30 hours/week (long-term)

Location: Remote (Philippines preferred)

Start: ASAP

Reports to: Founder (me)

Brand: CEOR — premium travel suitcases & accessories for the UK market



About CEOR



CEOR is building a premium, modern travel brand in the UK. We already have the products and a Shopify store — now we need someone senior who can take full ownership and transform the store into a real brand with consistent visuals, messaging, and profitable acquisition.



I’m looking for someone who can run the brand end-to-end: Shopify + creative direction + AI-enhanced product imagery + Google Ads + Meta Ads. You will “own the outcome,” not just do tasks.



What you will own (the mission)



Turn CEOR into a brand that looks and feels premium everywhere:



Shopify storefront & product pages (high-converting, luxury feel)



Product visuals (including AI workflows that look real, not fake)



Google Ads & Meta Ads performance (profitable scaling)



Consistent branding across the entire customer journey



Key Responsibilities

1) Brand & Creative Direction (Luxury, Premium, Consistent)



Build CEOR’s brand identity system: tone of voice, visual rules, layouts, imagery style, messaging pillars



Create a brand guide we can use for everything (ads, PDPs,
, socials, packaging)



Own the “premium feel” of the brand (details matter)



2) Shopify Store Ownership (CRO + Merchandising)



Improve homepage, collections, PDPs, navigation, trust elements, upsells, bundles



Write/optimize product descriptions (premium, not “generic ecommerce”)



Ensure site speed, clean UI, strong mobile UX



Implement conversion improvements using data (GA4/Shopify analytics/Hotjar-style insights)



3) AI Product Photography & Visual Production (Must-have)



We will use AI to upgrade and scale visuals while keeping them believable and consistent.



Turn existing product photos into premium-looking lifestyle / studio images using AI tools



Maintain accuracy (no misleading materials, shapes, colors)



Create repeatable workflows: prompts, templates, scene styles, naming, file organization



Deliver image sets for:



Shopify PDP galleries



Meta ad creatives (static + simple motion concepts)



Google assets (Performance Max / Discovery-style creatives)



4) Paid Ads Management (Google + Meta)



Plan, launch, and optimize:



Google Ads (Search, Shopping/Performance Max, remarketing)



Meta Ads (prospecting + retargeting, creative testing system)



Build testing frameworks: angles, hooks, offers, landing page alignment



Track performance properly (Pixel/CAPI, GA4 events, product feed hygiene)



Report weekly with clear insights and next actions



5) Growth & Operations



Create a weekly execution plan and run it without hand-holding



Coordinate with any freelancers if needed (video editor, designer, copywriter)



Keep everything organized (ClickUp/Notion/Sheets)



Required Experience (please don’t apply without these)



3+ years experience managing a Shopify brand (not just VA tasks)



Strong portfolio showing before/after improvements in:



Shopify store design/CRO



Brand visuals and messaging



Proven results with Google Ads + Meta Ads (screenshots/case studies welcome)



Real experience with AI image workflows for ecommerce product visuals

(Examples required — especially “realistic” outputs)



Strong English copy and premium brand taste



You are proactive, fast, and highly accountable



Nice-to-have (big plus)



Experience with UK ecommerce customers (or premium/luxury positioning)



/SMS flows (Klaviyo) and landing page testing



Basic video ad direction (UGC scripts, hooks, editing briefs)



Tools (you should be comfortable with most of these)



Shopify (themes, apps, product pages, collections)



Meta Ads Manager + Business Suite



Google Ads + Merchant Center + product feeds



GA4 / Shopify analytics



Creative tools: Canva + Photoshop (or equivalent)



AI tools for product imagery (examples: generative fill, AI photoshoots, background/lifestyle generation)



Success KPIs (what “good” looks like)



Store looks premium and consistent (brand-level presentation)



Higher conversion rate on key products/collections



Scalable ads with clear testing system and improving ROAS/MER



Reliable weekly output: new creatives, better pages, smarter campaigns



Work Style & Communication



30 hours/week (consistent schedule)



Daily updates (short) + weekly performance report (clear numbers + actions)



You take ownership and come with solutions — I don’t want to micromanage



How to Apply (IMPORTANT)



When you apply, include:



Your portfolio (Shopify stores, brand work, ad creatives)



2–3 case studies (even short): what you changed + results



AI product photo examples (before ? after) that look realistic



A short note:



Why you’re a fit for a premium travel brand



Which part you’re strongest in: Brand / Shopify / Ads / AI visuals



Optional but preferred: links/screenshots of ad accounts showing performance



Applications without portfolio + AI examples will be ignored.



Paid Test (final step)



Shortlisted candidates will do a paid test task, for example:



Improve 1 product page + propose 5 AI image concepts (with prompt approach)



Outline a 14-day ads plan (Google + Meta) with testing angles and creative needs



If you want to own a brand and build something premium long-term, apply now with your proof of work.

title: Executive Assistant
description:
Read This Before Applying

This is not a basic virtual assistant role.



If you are looking for simple task lists, calendar management, or repetitive admin work — this is not a fit.



This role exists to create leverage for a fast-moving CEO and COO at a growing U.S.-based marketing agency.



You will operate in a high-context, high-standards environment with frequent switching between hiring, writing, coordination, analytics, and execution.



If you thrive in ambiguity, think in systems, and use AI as a force multiplier — keep reading.



The Mission

Own the flow of information from raw input ? structured system ? finished output so leadership is no longer the bottleneck.

You will turn voice notes, Loom recordings, transcripts, and messy ideas into:

- Clean documents

- Structured hiring pipelines

- Organized dashboards

- Polished communication

- Reliable execution systems



If this role is done well, leadership feels:

- Fewer dropped balls

- Fewer repeated explanations

- Less mental clutter

- Cleaner systems

- Higher quality written output

If that does not happen, the role is not being executed correctly.



Core Areas of Ownership



1. Hiring Pipeline Execution

This is one of the highest-leverage areas.

- You will turn transcripts into:

-- Job descriptions

-- Scorecards

-- Interview questions

-- Must-have vs. nice-to-have lists

- Post jobs

- Track applicants

- Schedule interviews

- Send follow-ups

- Draft offer
s (approved before sending)

- Prepare offer letters from templates

- Coordinate references

- Manage onboarding logistics



You must be comfortable extracting structure fro
ssy conversations using AI tools.



2. “You Speak, They Build” Operations

The Founder communicates in:

- Loom videos

- Slack voice notes

- Call transcripts

- Bullet points



You turn them into:

- SOPs

- Checklists

- Notion docs

- Decision memos

- Organized execution plans

You are responsible for clarity.



3. COO Support & Internal Coordination

You will:

- Maintain executive priority trackers

- Prepare meeting agendas

- Capture notes and action items

- Follow up on commitments

- Build weekly summaries:

-- What moved

-- What’s stuck

-- What needs decision

You must follow up politely but persistently.



4. Travel & Logistics (Business + Personal)

You will own:

- Flights

- Hotels

- Itineraries

- Calendar adjustments

- Expense tracking

- Changes and cancellations

Mistakes here cost real money and time. Accuracy matters.



5. Data Organization & Reporting

You will:

- Clean messy spreadsheets

- Standardize naming conventions

- Structure data so it becomes usable

- Create charts for leadership review

- Maintain simple dashboards in Google Sheets

- Use AI tools to accelerate reporting

- Dashboards must support decisions — not decoration.



6. AI-Enabled Writing & Communication

You will draft:

- Internal announcements

- Client
s

- SOPs

- Hiring documents

- Onboarding materials

- Meeting follow-ups

- Templates



Writing must be:

- Clear

- Direct

- Professional

- No fluff

- Strong written English is mandatory.



Required Skills

You must demonstrate:

- Excellent written English

- Strong organizational ability

- High attention to detail

- Comfort working independently

- Ability to manage multiple workstreams



Proficiency with:

- Google Docs

- Google Sheets

- Calendars

- Slack

- Loom

- ChatGPT / Claude

You must be comfortable using AI daily to increase speed and clarity.



Work Expectations

- Full-time (35 hours/week)

- Minimum 6-hour overlap with US Pacific Time

- Responsive during working hours

- Written updates without prompting

- Issues escalated same day

- Missed deadlines without notice are unacceptable



This Role Is Not For You If:

- You need step-by-step instructions

- You wait to be told what to do

- You dislike writing

- You struggle with ambiguity

- You avoid follow-up

- You prefer repetitive task-only roles



Compensation

- $12,480–$16,640 USD per year

- Paid bi-monthly (1st and 15th)

- Full-time, long-term position

- Annual performance-based raise

- Stable role inside a growing company



What Good Looks Like After 60 Days

Leadership experiences:

- Cleaner systems

- Organized hiring pipelines

- Clear documentation

- Fewer dropped balls

- Less reactive scrambling

- Higher writing quality with less revision

If you are still waiting for instructions after 60 days, this role is not a fit.



Application Instructions (Required)

To be considered, you must include:

- A 3–5 minute Loom video introducing yourself

- Your internet speed (upload & download)

- Confirmation of US PT overlap hours

- A short explanation of how you use AI tools in your daily workflow

Applications missing these will not be reviewed.



What to Expect After Applying

If your application meets the requirements listed above, you will receive a skills assessment within 48 hours. The assessment is a practical exercise based on a real scenario you would encounter in this role. It is designed to take a strong candidate 60–90 minutes. We will evaluate your ability to gather information, organize it clearly, and communicate with a team — not whether you used AI to help. Candidates who score well on the assessment will be invited to a live interview. We respect your time and move quickly.



Final Note

We are not hiring a helper. We are hiring a high-agency Executive Assistant who thinks like an operator and uses AI as leverage. If you want stability, growth, and real ownership — apply.

title: Real Estate ISA
description:
Title: Full-Time Inside Sales Agent (ISA) – Real Estate

Employment Type: Full-Time

Location: Remote

Reports To: Team Lead 

Leadership Oversight: Angel Collins 

Administrative Oversight: Sabrina | Selling LA Luxury Admin



Position Overview

The Inside Sales Agent (ISA) is a full-time, high-performance prospecting specialist responsible for generating listing appointments through strategic outbound calling and disciplined follow-up.



This is not a passive lead role.

This is a proactive revenue-producing position focused on:

• Expired listings

• Cancelled listings

• Withdrawn listings

• Circle dialing around active listings

• Distressed sellers

• Database nurture & reactivation



The ISA will operate in a structured, metrics-driven environment and must consistently produce a minimum of 15 qualified appointments per month for leadership.



Appointment Routing Structure

All appointments scheduled by the ISA will be set exclusively with the team lead, 



No appointments are assigned to junior agents.

This ensures:

• High conversion rates

• Elite client experience

• Brand consistency

• Leadership-level execution



Required Work Schedule (PST)

The ISA must be available:

Weekdays (3 Days Per Week Required)

???? 7:00 AM – 11:00 AM PST

???? 4:00 PM – 8:00 PM PST

Weekends (Mandatory)

Saturday & Sunday

???? 10AM-6PM

Full-time commitment: 40 hours per week

Weekend availability is non-negotiable due to seller accessibility.



Core Responsibilities

Prospecting & Outbound Calling

• Daily high-volume outbound calls

• 150+ dials per day (minimum expectation)

• Prospect from Vulcan7 and Mojo Triple Line Dialer

• Contact expired, cancelled, withdrawn, circle dial, and distressed sellers

• Re-engage older database leads

ISA must be fully proficient in:

• Vulcan7

• Mojo Triple Line Dialer

• CRM data entry

• Structured follow-up systems



Lead Qualification Standards

All calls must follow structured conversational frameworks (Phil Jones and Tom Ferry methodology encouraged).

Each lead must be qualified for:

• Motivation

• Timeline

• Property condition

• Equity position (if known)

• Emotional driver

• Decision maker status

Appointments must be quality-based, not volume-based.



Appointment Setting & Coordination

The ISA is responsible for:

• Setting a minimum of 15 qualified appointments per month

• Inputting all appointments into the team calendar immediately

• Providing full appointment notes in CRM

• Confirming appointments 24 hours prior and same day

• Coordinating with Listing Coordinator to ensure:

Property research completed

Agent prepared

Pre-listing materials sent (if required)

Confirmation complete

The ISA must ensure leadership walks into fully prepared appointments.



CRM & Administrative Standards

All contacts must be:

• Entered into Compass CRM

• Tagged appropriately

• Logged same day

• Assigned follow-up dates

Each record must include:

• Motivation

• Timeline

• Property details

• Notes from conversation

• Next action step

Failure to log activity daily is grounds for performance review.



Training & Role Play (Mandatory)

To maintain elite conversion standards, ISA must:

? Attend all team trainings

? Participate in mandatory role play

? Practice objection handling weekly

? Demonstrate script mastery

Role play is a required performance metric.



Performance Expectations

Minimum Standards:

• 150+ dials per day

• 15+ qualified appointments per month

• 65–70% show rate

• Clean CRM compliance

• Strong appointment quality

Top performers will exceed 18–20 appointments monthly.



Compensation Structure

Base Pay:

• $5 per hour

• Paid on the 1st and 15th

Performance Bonuses:

• $10 per contract signed from ISA appointment

• $50 per closed sale from ISA appointment

Bonuses tracked via internal KPI dashboard.

Growth potential available for high producers.



Ideal Candidate

We are looking for someone who is:

? Comfortable being on the phone 8 hours daily

? Mentally resilient

? Highly disciplined

? Coachable

? Detail-oriented

? Results-driven

? Confident but consultative



???? What This Role Truly Is

This is a pipeline-building role.

The ISA is responsible for feeding leadership high-quality listing opportunities consistently.

If you want to grow in real estate sales and learn directly under top producers in Los Angeles, this is a powerful opportunity.



???? How to Apply

Send the following to:



Include:

• Updated Resume

• 1–2 minute audio introduction

• Brief explanation of why you are a fit for a high-performance sales environment

title: Experienced content writer with a passion for SEO
description:
About Us:

We’re a fast-growing digital agency helping service-based businesses scale through high-performing websites, SEO, and paid media.



Our focus is simple: build digital assets that convert and drive measurable growth.



We believe great agencies are built by developing great people. We invest heavily in our team’s growth and provide structured upskilling in SEO fundamentals, strategy, and performance marketing through curated educational videos, online tools, mentorship, and real-world implementation.



We’re now looking for an experienced Content Writer with a genuine passion for SEO, someone who doesn’t just write words, but understands strategy, search intent, and commercial outcomes.



This is not a “blog churn” role.

This is strategic, conversion-focused content.



The Role

As our SEO Content Strategist & Conversion Copywriter, you will play a key role in shaping the performance of our clients’ digital presence.



You’ll be responsible for creating high-converting landing pages, website copy, and strategic SEO content that drives rankings, leads, and revenue.



You’ll work closely with our SEO, Google Ads, and Web Design teams to ensure messaging aligns with strategy, UX, and performance goals.



You’ll also continue developing your own SEO capability — deepening your understanding of ranking strategy, search intent mapping, competitive positioning, and conversion psychology as part of your role.



What You’ll Be Doing:

- Writing high-converting landing page copy for service-based businesses

- Creating full website content for web design projects

- Conducting keyword research and mapping content to search intent

- Developing SEO-driven content strategies

- Collaborating on SEO & Google Ads strategy (ad messaging, extensions, positioning)

- Optimising on-page elements (headlines, meta titles, descriptions, internal linking)

- Structuring content for UX, CRO, and readability

- Reviewing competitor positioning and identifying content gaps

- Continuously upskilling in SEO fundamentals and advanced strategy through internal training, educational content, and online tools



What We’re Looking For:

- 2+ years experience in SEO-focused content writing

- Proven experience writing landing pages for service-based businesses

- Strong understanding of keyword research and search intent

- Experience working alongside SEO or paid ads teams



Skills & Traits



Great Communicator - You can clearly articulate ideas, ask smart questions, and translate strategy into compelling copy.



Team Player - You collaborate well with designers, SEO specialists, and account managers.



Growth Mindset - You actively look to improve your craft, embrace feedback, and stay current with SEO trends and AI tools.



Strategic Thinker - You understand that content is part of a larger marketing system. You think beyond words — toward outcomes.



Commercially Aware - You understand that content must convert, not just rank.



What You’ll Get:

- Ongoing structured upskilling in SEO fundamentals and strategy

- Access to curated educational videos, tools, and learning resources

- Mentorship and practical implementation experience

- A collaborative, high-performance environment

- Exposure to diverse industries and growth strategies

- Real ownership and impact in a growing agency

- Flexible working hours 



How to Apply



Please include:

- 3–5 examples of landing pages you’ve written

- A brief explanation of the SEO strategy behind one of those pieces

- Write 'Cool Bananas' at the top of your reply



If you’re passionate about SEO, strategy, and writing content that drives measurable growth — and you’re excited to continuously level up your skillset — we’d love to hear from you.



Cheers - Mitch

title: Senior Full-Stack Developer & Technical Interview Consultant
description:
We are a U.S.-focused software consulting and talent delivery company supporting startups and mid-sized companies with engineering and technical hiring.

We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Full-Stack Developer to join our team as a Technical Interview Consultant, or with developer on a long-term freelance basis.

In this role, you will represent our company in technical interviews and client discussions with hiring partners in the United States, and you will also lead, support, or contribute to software development work after the interview process, depending on the role you choose.

We’ll arrange all interviews with U.S. clients, so you can focus on performing your best.

This role is ideal for someone who is confident, articulate, and comfortable thinking on their feet when facing unfamiliar technical challenges.



???? Responsibilities

  - Represent our company during technical interviews and client meetings with U.S.-based hiring partners.

  - Evaluate candidates’ technical skills, problem-solving ability, and overall engineering competency.

  - Clearly explain technical concepts and architectural decisions to non-technical and technical stakeholders.

  - Lead, support, or contribute to development projects after successful client engagements based on your choice.

  - Collaborate with internal teams and client stakeholders throughout the project lifecycle.



???? Required Qualifications

  - 5+ years of professional full-stack development experience.

  - Strong understanding of system design, data structures, algorithms, and modern web architecture.

  - Professional experience with one or more of the following technologies or stacks:

  - JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, PHP, Ruby (Ruby on Rails), React, Node, SQL, MongoDB, and cloud or DevOps environments.

  - Previous experience conducting technical interviews for U.S. companies (strongly preferred).

  - Excellent spoken and written English communication skills.

  - Comfortable appearing on video and using remote collaboration tools such as Zoom and Google Meet.

  - Availability to work primarily during U.S. (EST) business hours.



???? Compensation

   In the U.S., many jobs pay above $8000 and more per month, and the workload is often lighter than in many other's ones.

   You can start earning income quickly if you are confident in your English communication and development skills.

   The more projects you help us win, the more you can earn.

   Compensation varies based on your role, experience, and level of responsibility.

   You are paid when your project generates revenue, so your compensation is calculated as a percentage of the project’s 

   total project budget.

   Percentages are calculated based on the client’s gross project payment.

   Outstanding contributors may receive a performance bonus of up to 5?ter project completion, based on exceptional 

   quality, fast and reliable delivery, and strong client feedback.

   After considering financial factors such as taxes, we have set the rates below to be mutually beneficial for both the 

   company and you.

-  Interview-Only Role

   If you participate as a Technical Interview Consultant during a project and the project is completed successfully, you will 

   receive 10%–12% of the project’s total budget, based on your ability to build client trust and represent our company 

   professionally.

- Developer + Technical Interview Consultant Role

  You will receive 45~50% of the project’s total budget

title: Performance Marketing Lead (Instagram Focus)
description:
We are seeking a results-driven Performance Marketing Lead to develop, execute, and optimize high-impact digital campaigns with a strong focus on Instagram. The ideal candidate is analytical, creative, and experienced in driving measurable growth through paid social strategies. This role requires a deep understanding of Instagram advertising, audience targeting, conversion optimization, and performance analytics.



Key Responsibilities



Lead the strategy, execution, and optimization of paid campaigns on Instagram.

Develop data-driven marketing plans to increase brand awareness, engagement, leads, and conversions.

Manage advertising budgets to maximize ROI and achieve performance targets.

Conduct A/B testing on creatives, copy, targeting, and bidding strategies.

Analyze campaign performance metrics (CTR, CPC, CPA, ROAS) and provide actionable insights.

Collaborate with the creative team to produce high-converting ad content tailored for Instagram.

Monitor market trends, competitor activity, and platform updates to ensure competitive advantage.

Prepare detailed performance reports for stakeholders with strategic recommendations.

Ensure tracking and analytics tools (e.g., Meta Ads Manager, Google Analytics) are properly implemented.



Qualifications



Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or related field.

3+ years of experience in performance marketing or paid social media advertising.

Proven expertise in Instagram Ads and Meta Business Suite.

Strong analytical skills and experience interpreting campaign data.

Experience with conversion tracking, pixel implementation, and retargeting strategies.

Excellent communication and leadership skills.

Ability to manage multiple campaigns in a fast-paced environment.

title: Social Media & Authority Branding Manager
description:
Remote Long-Term Role

For ROI Intelligence & Resi Inspections (Australia)



IMPORTANT: This is NOT a basic VA role.



We are looking for someone who can take full ownership of our social media, content pipeline and brand positioning.

If you are someone who waits to be told what to post — this role is not for you.

If you are strategic, proactive and see opportunity in existing content — keep reading.



About Us

We run two established Australian brands:

ROI Intelligence – International speaking, business & AI Agency brand

Resi Inspections – Building & Pest Inspection company in Queensland





We have:

International speaking footage

Celebrity photos and high-level business associations

Podcast interviews

Professional video content

Book features and endorsements

Tens of hours of unused content



This content has not been fully leveraged.

We need someone who sees this as GOLD and knows how to turn it into authority positioning and growth.



Your Responsibilities

You will:

Take full ownership of all social media platforms

Create and execute a content strategy

Repurpose long-form content into short-form clips

Manage posting without being prompted

Grow engagement and followers

Use branding by association strategically

Create promotional campaigns around events and media appearances

Organise and consolidate accounts

Use AI tools & GHL to improve efficiency

Provide clear weekly reporting



You will not wait for daily instructions.

You will lead this area.



The Type of Person We Want

You:

Have proven experience growing business or personal brands

Think strategically, not just task-by-task

Understand authority positioning

Can identify strong branding opportunities

Are confident making suggestions

Work independently

Have excellent written English

Are organised and systems-focused



If you describe yourself as “just a VA” this role is not for you.



KPIs

Consistent posting across all platforms

Measurable growth in followers and engagement

Regular repurposing of existing assets

Strategic use of high-level associations

Clear reporting on growth and strategy



To Apply (IMPORTANT)



To be considered, you must:

Send a 2–3 minute video explaining how you would use:

International speaking footage

Celebrity photos

Podcast interviews

Endorsements

Provide examples of brands you have helped grow and what results you achieved



Please include your expected full-time monthly salary in your application.

Applications without these will not be considered.



We are looking for a long-term team member who wants to grow with us.

If you are proactive, strategic and excited by building authority brands — we want to hear from you.

title: Part-time VA (20 hrs/week) – Outreach + CRM + Call Intake for Property Management (Brevard, FL)
description:
Title: Part-time VA (20 hrs/week) – Outreach + CRM + Call Intake for Property Management (Brevard, FL)



Pay: $5–$8/hour depending on performance (starts at $5/hour during paid trial)



Schedule: 20 hrs/week (4 hrs/day, Mon–Fri)

Preferred: Overlap with US Eastern morning hours (Florida time)



---



About the Role



We are a small but growing property turnover readiness company serving property managers in Florida.



This role is a mix of:



* **Outreach support

* **CRM/data entry

* **Inbound/return call intake

* **Call booking / scheduling support



This is not a high-pressure sales role.

Your main job is to help us reach the right contact, keep records clean, and book qualified calls for the owner.



---



Responsibilities



* Build and verify property manager contacts (company, name, role,
, phone)

* Use approved scripts to send routing messages (contact forms +
)

* Make short outbound routing calls when needed (example: “Who handles unit turns/vendor scheduling?”)

* Handle inbound / return calls using a script (intake + qualification + scheduling only)

* Log all activities accurately in our Excel tracking system

* Organize replies and flag qualified leads for owner follow-up

* Book short calls for the owner and record callback details



---



Important: Call Handling Scope (to avoid confusion)



You will handle outbound + inbound calls, but this is not full sales closing.



You will:



* ask routing / qualification questions

* gather basic details

* schedule calls

* escalate qualified leads



You will not:



* negotiate pricing

* customize contracts

* promise service availability

* close deals



We provide scripts and SOPs.



---



Requirements



* Excellent written and spoken English

* Comfortable making short business calls (routing + intake, not hard selling)

* Confident, polite, and professional phone manner

* Detail-oriented with spreadsheets / data entry

* Reliable internet connection and quiet work environment

* Headset with working microphone

* Can follow SOPs/scripts without freelancing



---



Preferred (Nice to Have)



* Experience with real estate / property management / cleaning vendors

* Experience with CRM logging

* Experience handling inbound calls and booking appointments

* Familiarity with US time zones (especially Eastern Time)



---



Required Test (must be included in your application)



Please include all of the following:



1. Write a 2-sentence routing message for a website contact form (no sales pitch).

2. For 3 companies (we will provide names), find the best
/contact route and explain your method.

3. Confirm your internet speed + headset availability.

4. Record a 30–45 second voice sample reading this line naturally:

   “Hi, this is [Your Name] with Unit Turnover Solutions Co. Thanks for calling back. Are you calling about unit turns or move-out turnover support?”



---



Application Instructions (Important)



To be considered, put the word TURNOVER at the top of your application and include:



* your hourly rate

* your available schedule (in your local time + US Eastern Time)

* whether you are comfortable with inbound and outbound calls

* your voice sample link/file



Applications without the word TURNOVER  may be skipped.



---



Trial Process (Paid)



Shortlisted candidates will complete a paid trial (5 hours) with tasks such as:



* contact research

* routing messages

* simple call handling / call logging

* CRM / Excel updates



If you are organized, reliable, and comfortable on the phone, this can become a long-term role.

title: OPERATIONS SUPPORT OFFICER
description:
Oztech Sparks Electrical & Security is a high-performance Australian company

specialising in CCTV, smart home technology, alarms and electrical services. We are

building a world-class backend operations team and are seeking an exceptional

Operations Support Officer to join our Philippines-based division. This is not a basic VA

role. This is a career opportunity inside a structured and growing organisation.



CORE RESPONSIBILITIES

• Answer inbound calls from Australian clients

• Return missed calls promptly and professionally

• Make outbound confirmation and follow-up calls

• Book quotes and jobs into our job management system

• Coordinate technician schedules accurately

• Manage shared inbox and prioritise
s

• Maintain clean and organised job documentation

• Follow up suppliers for ETAs

• Assist with invoice and payment follow-ups

• Provide basic tech support after structured training



WHO WE’RE LOOKING FOR

• Confident English communication with neutral accent

• Comfortable making outbound calls

• Assertive yet professional customer manner

• Highly organised and process-driven

title: SEO Copywriter / Content Writer
description:
Applications that do not include all required items in the “How to Apply” section will not be reviewed. We value attention to detail and the ability to follow instructions—key traits for this role. If any part of this application is incomplete or missing, your submission will be automatically disregarded.?



About Us:

We are a luxury watch-focused brand looking to elevate our content strategy. Our audience values detailed, accurate, and engaging content about high-end watches like Rolex, Patek Philippe, Audemars Piguet, Omega, and more. We are seeking a talented SEO Copywriter/Content Writer who combines creativity with technical SEO skills to help us deliver content that ranks and resonates.

- Knowledge and passion for luxury watches (Rolex, Patek Philippe, Audemars Piguet, Omega, etc.) is a must.

- Experience writing for B2C audiences preferred.

- Basic graphic design skills using Canva.

- Eager to learn and adapt to new tools and strategies.



Why Join Us:

Work remotely with a flexible schedule.

Collaborate with a passionate team focused on luxury watch content.

Opportunity to expand your skills in SEO, content creation, and luxury brand marketing.



How to Apply

2. Your personality test - Take it here - Please send a link to your results/confirmation page (not a screenshot).





3. Your updated resume, showcasing your most relevant experience.



4. Typing Test - Take this typing test (30 seconds): 





5. A video or videos that answer the following. Feel free to give as much information and context as possible. Also please make sure that, when you submit the video(s) links, they are in public, viewable format.





a. Introduce and tell us about yourself. Hobbies/passions. Career/life/financial goals and in what amount of time? Be very specific here. What have you been saving money for? What specific item/asset is it? When do you expect to acquire it? How do you plan on achieving that goal?





b. Show off your work setup (computer/laptop, monitor(s), speakers, lights, etc) and tech setup - browser you use, other tech/platforms you use.

Map out the process that you came up with in google docs, google sheets, or in canva as a visual representation. How could you have made it easier/faster/better using AI?

6. Complete the short writing task:

title: Senior Bookkeeper / Virtual Assistant, Full-Time Remote
description:
We are a U.S.-based bookkeeping services company managing books for multiple clients across different industries. We need a senior bookkeeper who does not need to be managed.

That means you get assigned a client, you review their accounts, you understand their business, and you categorize their transactions correctly. On your own. The first time. If you need someone to tell you what each transaction means, this job is not for you.

We have two requirements that are not negotiable: integrity and independent judgment. In that order.

What This Job Actually Is

This is not a follow-the-instructions role. You will be given client accounts and expected to own them. That means:

Reviewing a client's chart of accounts and transaction history and understanding it without being coached

Categorizing transactions correctly based on the type of business they run

Spotting anything unusual, ambiguous, or wrong and flagging it before it becomes a problem

Knowing that a medical practice and a construction company have different books and applying that knowledge

Communicating problems early, not after the fact



If you are the type who waits to be told what to do, please do not apply. If you are the type who figures it out and escalates only the genuinely unclear stuff, we want to talk to you.

Day to Day Responsibilities

Transaction categorization across multiple client accounts, independently

Bank and credit card reconciliations

Accounts payable and accounts receivable

Payroll entry from Gusto payroll reports into QBO

Recording Stripe and other payment processor transactions, including fee handling

Financial reporting support

Sending templated client requests such as asking for bank statements. No freeform client communication.

Light VA work including entering financial data into Excel or Fathom for KPI reporting, and occasional website posting



Software

Required:

QuickBooks Online (QBO), must be proficient

Xero, must be proficient

Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets



Preferred, training available if needed:

Double, formerly known as Keeper, for transaction review and categorization

Fathom for KPI reporting



What We Are Looking For

Education:

BS Accountancy degree required. CPA preferred but not required.

Solid working knowledge of U.S. accounting standards and practices



Experience:

At least 3 years managing books for multiple U.S.-based clients at the same time

Proven ability to onboard a new client account without hand-holding

Experience across different business types and industries



Who you are:

Honest. You flag mistakes, including your own. You do not hide them.

Self-directed. You take ownership of your accounts.

Proactive. You raise issues before they become problems.

Available to overlap with U.S. Central Standard Time business hours

Strong written English



Pay and Benefits

$5.00 USD per hour, full-time at 40 hours per week, with CST overlap required.



Benefits include:

13th month pay

Paid Philippine public holidays

Paid trial period before full onboarding



We start every new hire with a paid trial period of 2 to 3 weeks on a single client account. It lets both sides confirm the fit before full onboarding. We are looking for someone long-term, not a short engagement.





How to Apply

Read every word of this section. Following instructions is part of the job.

Phase 1: Written Application

Apply through OnlineJobs.ph and include:

Your resume or work history with specific bookkeeping experience and the industries you have worked in

Your education and any accounting certifications

A short paragraph about why integrity matters to you in a bookkeeping role

Written answers to all four screening questions below



Screening Questions:

Question 1: You are assigned a new client who runs a physical therapy practice. You have their chart of accounts and three months of uncategorized transactions. Walk us through how you approach it. What do you look at first? How do you determine the right categories? And what do you do when a transaction is unclear?

Question 2: How do you record a Stripe payout in QuickBooks Online? Walk us through how you handle Stripe fees and the difference between the gross payout and the amount that actually hits the bank account.

Question 3: A client's Gusto payroll report shows gross wages of $4,200, employer taxes of $380, and net pay of $3,820. Walk us through every account you would use in QBO and how you confirm the net pay matches the bank withdrawal.

Question 4: Tell us about a time you caught a bookkeeping error, yours or someone else's. What was the error, what did you do, and what happened?

One more thing: somewhere in the middle of your application, include the word Tangerine exactly once in your subject line. Applications without it will not be reviewed.

Phase 2: Video Response

If your written application stands out, we will send you a client scenario and ask for a short Loom video, 2 to 3 minutes, walking through your answer. No preparation needed. This just confirms that what you wrote is what you actually know.

Phase 3: Live Interview

Finalists will have a short live video call with follow-up questions based on their earlier answers. It is a conversation, not a test. We want to make sure this works for both of us.





We run a professional operation, and we take the quality of our work seriously. If you are an accountant who owns their accounts, catches problems early, and does not need to be managed, we would like to hear from you.

We look forward to your application.

title: Product Development Lead
description:
Role Overview 



American Standard Adhesives is seeking a Product Development Program Manager to lead new product initiatives from concept through launch. 



This role is responsible for structuring research, coordinating suppliers, synthesizing technical and operational information, and translating complex requirements into clear execution plans. 



This is not a laboratory chemistry role. 

It is a systems-driven product development and coordination position focused on structure, clarity, documentation, and execution. 



The objective is simple: bring new products to market in a controlled, well-documented, and scalable way. 





Core Responsibilities 



Product Research & Analysis 



- Conduct structured research on materials, suppliers, applications, and market positioning 



- Review technical documentation and extract relevant decision criteria 



- Identify specification gaps, risks, and operational exposures 



- Present structured recommendations 





Supplier & Vendor Coordination 



- Communicate with domestic and international suppliers 



- Draft professional inquiry
s and technical briefs 



- Align specifications and confirm documentation requirements 



- Track supplier deliverables and timelines 





Program Structuring & Execution 



- Develop product briefs and structured NPI (New Product Introduction) timelines 



- Build documentation frameworks for product qualification and release 



- Coordinate cross-functional inputs (operations, procurement, logistics) 



- Ensure milestone discipline and follow-through 





Documentation & Process Development 



- Create and maintain product specifications 



- Develop structured SOPs where needed 



- Maintain traceability documentation frameworks 



- Support regulatory documentation alignment (SDS, compliance files) 





Risk Identification & Process Improvement 



- Identify ambiguity in product specs or supplier communication 



- Flag operational or qualification risks early 



- Recommend structural improvements to reduce future friction 







Required Qualifications 



- 7–12 years experience in industrial product development, manufacturing, or B2B materials 



- Experience managing physical product launches (not SaaS) 



- Strong written communication skills 



- Experience coordinating overseas suppliers 



- High ability to synthesize complex information into structured outputs 



- Comfortable reviewing technical documentation 





Preferred Background 



- Industrial manufacturing 



- Packaging, adhesives, materials, or distribution 



- Private label product programs 



- Contract manufacturing environments 



- Multi-SKU program coordination 



 



Core Competencies 



- Systems thinking 



- Structured problem solving 



- Strong written clarity 



- Project coordination discipline 



- Risk awareness 



- Independent execution

mbers, partners, and customers.

title: Automation & Fulfilment Systems Builder
description:
About Us:



We run a lead generation agency that delivers structured lead data to clients.

Our core workflow looks like:

Order Form > Internal Database > External Data Enrichment > Collation > Client Sheet > Automated Delivery

We are building a clean, scalable fulfilment engine.

We’re looking for a Systems Builder to own and optimise this.

Long-term role.



Core Responsibilities:



Core Fulfilment Workflow

You will build and optimise:

- GHL Order Form trigger

-Send data to Google Sheets + CRM

- Slack internal notification

- Query internal leads database

- If criteria not met ? trigger external scraping

- Collate data into structured client sheet

- Deliver final dataset via automated

- This must run cleanly with minimal manual work.



Client Onboarding

- Create structured onboarding workflows

- Connect domains,
 infrastructure, Slack notifications

- Set up CRM fields & pipelines

- Create internal delivery tracking

- Reduce friction in new client setup



Data Handling & Logic

- Avoid duplicate data

- Clean messy external data

- Create reusable logic flows

- Ensure deliverability and accuracy

- Improve system efficiency over time



Skills Required

- Zapier / Make

- Strong webhook knowledge

- Google Sheets automation

- Slack API integration

- Basic CRM structuring

- Experience using scraping tools

- Strong logical systems thinking



Bonus:

- Clay / PhantomBuster / Apollo

- Basic scripting (Python or JS)

- API integrations



Salary Range (Philippines)



Mid-Level (Can Build With Direction):

$1,200 – $1,800/month



Senior (Can Architect Systems Independently):

$1,800 – $2,500/month



This role is more technical than a VA but not full engineering.



To Apply

Send:



1. Loom showing an automation system you built end-to-end

2. Tools you’ve used for scraping

3. Example of a conditional workflow you designed

4. Salary expectation



Subject line: “Fulfilment Systems Builder”

title: Full-time Amazon PPC Manager
description:
About the Company 

Amazon Growth Lab is a performance focused Amazon growth agency helping brands scale 

profitably in a highly competitive marketplace. We partner with ambitious sellers and brand 

owners to optimize listings, increase visibility, and drive sustainable revenue growth through 

data backed strategies. Our team stays ahead of Amazon platform changes, advertising 

innovations, and marketplace trends to deliver measurable results for our clients. 



Role Overview 

We are looking for an experienced Amazon PPC Manager to own and scale advertising 

performance across multiple client accounts. This role requires a strong understanding of 

Amazon’s latest advertising ecosystem, including automation, retail signals, and full funnel 

strategy. You will be responsible for driving efficient growth, improving profitability, and 

continuously optimizing campaigns based on performance data. 



Key Responsibilities 

? Plan, launch, manage, and optimize Amazon PPC campaigns across Sponsored 

Products, Sponsored Brands, Sponsored Brands Video, and Sponsored Display 

? Build and manage Amazon DSP campaigns, including static and dynamic display ads, 

video ads, and OTT formats. 

? Structure campaigns using current best practices including keyword targeting, product 

targeting, audience targeting, and brand defense strategies 

? Optimize bids, budgets, and placements to improve ACoS, TACoS, ROAS, and overall 

account profitability 

? Analyze search term reports, retail metrics, and performance trends to identify scaling 

and optimization opportunities 

? Leverage Amazon features such as budget rules, placement adjustments, audience 

retargeting, and brand analytics insights 

? Stay current with Amazon advertising updates, policy changes, and new beta features 

? Collaborate with account managers, listing optimization, and creative teams to align PPC 

strategy with overall growth goals 

? Leverage retargeting, lookalike audiences, and demographic targeting to improve 

conversion rates and lifetime value. 

? Prepare clear performance reports with insights, recommendations, and next steps for 

internal teams and clients 



Skills & Qualifications 

? Proven hands on experience managing Amazon PPC accounts with measurable results 

? Strong understanding of Amazon’s current advertising platform, attribution model, and 

retail readiness factors 

? Advanced analytical skills with the ability to translate data into actionable strategy 

? Experience with keyword research, bid optimization, campaign scaling, and search term 

harvesting 

? Familiarity with third party Amazon PPC and analytics tools 

? Ability to manage multiple accounts independently while meeting performance targets 

and deadlines 

? Strong communication skills with experience presenting insights and recommendations 

? Experience managing PPC for multiple brands or agency environments 

? Understanding of full funnel Amazon strategy including ranking, organic growth, and 

lifecycle marketing 



Company Policy: 

? Schedule: Monday to Friday, core working hours from 6 AM to 2 PM Pacific Time  

? An 8-hour workday is required. 

? Time Tracking: Use Time Doctor to track hours and activity. 

? Full time contractors engaged by AGL must maintain an exclusive working relationship 

and are prohibited from performing services for other agencies while under contract. 



Applications sent using the link above will be highly prioritized.

title: Estimator (Construction Scope & Estimating Support)
description:
About Us

We are a U.S.-based General Contractor delivering residential and commercial projects. Our focus is on structured processes, clear communication, and accurate project documentation. As we continue to grow, we are expanding our offshore estimating support team to help streamline scope assembly and ensure our proposals are complete, organized, and ready for pricing.

This role is ideal for someone with construction administration or estimating experience who enjoys structured work, organized systems, and producing accurate documentation that supports decision-making. You will work closely with our leadership and estimating team to ensure project scopes are complete, clear, and ready for pricing.



Key Responsibilities

1) Scope Assembly

-Review construction walkthrough videos and transcripts

-Break down work items by room, trade, and scope category

-Flag missing or unclear information

2) Estimating & Documentation Support

-Enter structured scope details into Google Sheets using company templates

-Maintain clean, consistent formatting

-Review plans and documents to confirm scope completeness

-Assist in preparing organized proposal sheets for internal pricing

3) Additional Support

-Organize project files in Google Drive

-Maintain proper naming conventions and folder structure

-Update tracking sheets and internal checklists



Must Haves

-At least 2 years of experience working remotely for a U.S.-based construction company

-Experience in construction estimating, scope writing, or project coordination

-Clear written and spoken English (B2–C1 minimum)



About You

-Detail-oriented and accurate

-Comfortable reviewing plans, transcripts, and video walkthroughs

-Organized and process-driven

-Able to work independently and meet deadlines

-Proficient in Google Sheets (formulas, structured formatting)

-Experience with Trello or similar tools preferred



Working Arrangement

-Independent contractor position

-Part-time, remote

-Work PST hours

-Hourly compensation

-Must provide your own computer, reliable high-speed internet, and suitable workspace



Hiring Process

Short skills assessment including:

-Converting a walkthrough video into a structured scope list

-Organizing the scope in a provided spreadsheet template

title: Collections Support Agent - Start up
description:
If you’ve worked in BNPL/Credit and have solid customer service and payments collections experience, then this role is for you. Apply Here: 
/appqyBZJyyxs1htVk/pagvvCsolTY5tzwa7/form



Overview:

In this role, we’re searching for a Collections & Customer Operations Agent with amazing English skills and experience in finance, lending or BNPL (buy now, pay later).

As a Collections & Customer Operations Agent, you’ll be a supportive partner for our customers — helping them manage repayments, resolve arrears, and navigate their accounts with confidence. You’ll deliver clear, empathetic support via chat,
, and phone, ensuring every interaction leads to timely and positive resolutions.



IMPORTANT: Please carefully read the responsibilities section below to ensure you're a good fit (we'll be testing you on most of these!), and follow the instructions on how to apply at the bottom.



Compensation:

* Competitive salary: $1,300 - $1,500 USD per month (depending on experience and your capabilities)



Benefits:

* 100% Remote - work from anywhere in the Philippines.

* 15 days paid leave

* Bi-weekly salary payouts

* Paid time off and regular Philippine public holidays

* Supportive, startup-style culture where your ideas matter



Working Hours:

* Training and Onboarding - Monday - Friday: 10 AM – 5 PM UK time (6:00 PM – 1:00 AM PH time)

* Normal shift schedule will be determined after training and onboarding

* Must be comfortable working during the weekends with weekdays rest days

* This is a full time role only (40 hours per week)



Job Responsibilities:

* Manage customer repayments and collections by supporting payment arrangements, rescheduling plans, and monitoring overdue accounts with care and accuracy.

* Deliver exceptional multi-channel support (chat,
, and phone), with a strong focus on resolving collections, repayment, and arrears-related inquiries on first contact.

* Communicate clearly, consistently, and professionally while upholding brand standards across all customer interactions.

* Handle and resolve collections-related concerns and complaints with empathy and efficiency, escalating complex or sensitive cases when appropriate.

* Support brand reputation by responding professionally to customer reviews and public feedback, particularly those related to billing and repayments.

* Protect the business by proactively identifying, investigating, and escalating suspicious activity and potential fraud related to payments or accounts.

* Use AI-driven tools and systems to streamline collections workflows, improve response times, and enhance the quality and consistency of support.

* Contribute to continuous improvement by sharing customer feedback and collections insights with internal teams to strengthen processes and customer outcomes.



You’re Perfect for This Role If You

* Have proven experience in customer service or collections, ideally within fintech, payments, or lending (BNPL experience is a plus).

* Are knowledgeable about repayments, arrears management, and basic fraud detection, with empathy for customers facing financial challenges.

* Communicate confidently and professionally across chat,
, and phone, adapting your approach to sensitive collections conversations.

* Are comfortable using CRM systems, AI tools, and automation to manage accounts and prioritize work efficiently.

* Thrive in a fast-paced, customer-first environment where priorities can shift quickly.

* Are a detail-oriented, empathetic problem solver who balances customer care with sound business judgment.



How to Apply:

* Click the link below to submit your application and let's get started: 
/appqyBZJyyxs1htVk/pagvvCsolTY5tzwa7/form

title: Bookkeeper
description:
Bookkeeper (Remote) – Online Coaching & Digital Marketing Business



Location: Fully Remote

Type: Part-time or Full-time

Compensation: Based on experience



About Us



We are a fast-growing online education and coaching company focused on helping people learn high-income online skills and secure remote careers. Our business operates globally, with customers and expenses in multiple currencies, and we actively run paid advertising across platforms such as Meta and Google.



We are looking for a detail-oriented and reliable Bookkeeper to help manage our finances, track performance, and ensure accurate reporting.



Responsibilities



• Maintain accurate financial records and bookkeeping

• Record and reconcile transactions across multiple accounts

• Track revenue from digital products, coaching programs, and online sales

• Track and categorize advertising spend (Meta Ads, Google Ads, etc.)

• Handle accounts payable and accounts receivable

• Perform monthly bank and payment processor reconciliations (Stripe, PayPal, Wise, etc.)

• Prepare monthly financial reports and profit & loss statements

• Assist with cash flow tracking and financial organization

• Work closely with the founder to maintain financial clarity



IMPORTANT: Multi-Currency Experience Required



Our business operates heavily in multiple currencies, including:



• USD

• Other foreign currencies



You must have experience:



• Handling foreign currency transactions

• Performing accurate currency conversions

• Managing exchange rate differences

• Recording multi-currency bookkeeping properly



Experience with international businesses is highly preferred.



Requirements



• Proven bookkeeping experience (2+ years preferred)

description:
Customer Success & Sales Specialist (Google Ads Agency)



Full-Time | $6.25/hour | Long-Term | Weekdays Only | UK Timezone (9am–5pm)



We’re a growing performance marketing agency specialising in Meta Ads and Google Ads, working with clients directly and through Fiverr. We’re hiring a rockstar Customer Success & Sales Specialist to own customer communication end-to-end: responding fast, building trust, handling questions confidently, and converting enquiries into paying clients.



This role is for someone who enjoys talking to people, stays organised under pressure, and can move conversations forward without needing hand-holding.



The Role (What you’ll own)



You will be the “front desk” of the business — the person who ensures:



prospects get fast, confident answers and become customers, and



existing customers feel taken care of and stay happy.



You’ll manage messaging, qualify leads, sell our services, and coordinate internally so delivery runs smoothly.



Working Hours



Full-time: 8 hours/day



Monday to Friday only



Must be available 9am–5pm UK time



Responsibilities

Customer Communication & Support

Keep conversations professional, clear, and on-brand



Gather required details from customers to ensure smooth onboarding and delivery



Handle follow-ups, updates, and basic issue resolution before escalating



Sales & Conversions



Qualify inbound leads (understand needs, budget, timeline, urgency)



Confidently explain our service and recommend the right package



Overcome basic objections and guide prospects to purchase



Maintain strong response times and close loops (no dropped conversations)



Operations & Internal Coordination



Create/track tasks and updates in Notion (ticket management)



Coordinate with our internal team to ensure on-time delivery



Join quick internal calls when needed for handoffs, clarifications, or updates



What We’re Looking For

Must-Haves



Excellent written and spoken English (this is critical)



Strong organisation + reliability (you don’t drop balls)



Proactive mindset: you see problems coming and fix them early



Comfortable with customer communication and sales conversations



Big Bonus (Preferred)



Google Ads experience (even basic understanding helps you sell and communicate better)

Compensation & Perks

How to Apply

A 30-second video introducing yourself
